Nina is 51 years old. She lives in Dovrus village with her husband, a pensioner, and son. Nina and her husband started running a farm about 10 years ago. They gather income by selling milk and meat in the regional center, Kapan city. Nina would like to develop poultry breeding. She also needs to renovate the barn and create better conditions for development of cattle breeding. 

This loan will help Nina to purchase 150 hens and pay for the barn renovation. Development of agriculture will allow Nina to get additional income, which she plans to use for renovation of her house.

loans.use: to pay for barn renovation and hens

loans.name: Neang

texts.en: Neang, 51, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fruit for more than five years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Her husband runs a public transportation service (motor taxi). Her husband earns about USD 3 per day. In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Neang is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase more fruit to sell. By doing so, she would be able to earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit to sell

loans.name: Varsik

texts.en:
Varsik is 42 years old. She lives in Salvard village with her husband. Varsik's son is serving in the army at present. Varsik and her husband run a farm, where they breed cattle, cultivate land and keep beehives.

Varsik needs some financial investment to start the land cultivation. With the requested loan amount she plans to purchase 1200 kg barley seeds, 650 kg potato seeds, 30 bags of fertilizer and 550 liter fuel. These purchases will allow Varsik to start and complete the land cultivation and expect a good harvest during this year. Stable development of agriculture is important for Varsik, as she dreams of ensuring a higher quality of life for her son and his family in future.

loans.use: to pay for barley, potato seeds, fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Kamal

texts.en:
Kamal is a 51-year-old married man who has two sons and two daughters.

Kamal has recently opened a small take-away restaurant that sells hummus, foul, and barbeque.
 
Now Kamal has applied for this loan so he can expand by also making sandwiches and snacks.

loans.use: to expand his business by offering sandwiches and snacks.

loans.name: Touch

texts.en: Touch, 62, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling rice and rice bran for more than twenty years, earning approximately USD 15 per day. Her children are a garment worker and a soldier. They earn about USD 6 per day. In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Touch is requesting a loan of USD 700 for purchasing more rice and rice bran to sell.  By doing so, she would be able to generate more profit to support the family.  In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more rice and rice bran to sell

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa is a 33-year-old married woman. Her husband is serving in the military while she is raising her four children.

To be able to support the family while her husband is away, Sanaa has opened a room at her house for selling detergents, paper towels, and a few cosmetic products.

She has now applied to this loan to bring in more detergents and other products to sell to increase her revenues.

loans.use: to bring in more detergents and other products to sell.

loans.name: Choun

texts.en:
Choun, 33, is married and has two children attending school. She operates a small business selling grilled beef from a rented booth in a local market of Prey district to generate additional income for the family. She is hard-working in order to ensure a good living standard and provide basic necessities for her children. As shown in the photo, Choun is pouring the marinade over her beef and making pickle green papaya for the business. 

She is now asking for a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase and own a stall for selling purposes, so that she doesn’t need to pay any rented fees monthly. She hopes to obtain the loan and improve her business in the coming years. Choun plans to save her generated income for her children attending university after they finish high school. This will be her second loan with HKL.

loans.use: to purchase and own a stall for selling purposes.

loans.name: Motahr

texts.en:
Motahr is a 30-year-old married man who has four children who live together in Sana'a, Yemen. He is a hard-working and diligent man. He is also cheerful and kind. He lives comfortably with his children. 

He employs three people in his business. He started his business with limited capital and he has been selling chickens for 10 years. He considers his business profitable because of the good income it gives him. This is thanks to how well-received his business is with his customers.
 
He applied for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy chickens for his business to continue increasing his income.

He is looking forward to opening another chicken shop to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more chickens for his business to continue increasing his income.

loans.name: Alhowt Group

texts.en:
This group is called Alhowt. It consists of four members, Antsar, Amnh, Najeeba and Jameela, who are all females. All of them are friends and from Aden, Yemen. They are hard-working and professional in their business. All members took a loan of 260,000 YER.

Antsar is the leader of this group. (She is the second woman from right side whose face is covered.) She is a 32-year-old married woman who has three children who live together in Aden, Yemen. She had been working in different businesses where selling mobile recharge cards was part of the business.

She started her business with a previous loan from AMB. Her most important challenge is to keep her business stable and sustainable. She enjoys working and serving the needs of her family. Her business has been growing to the point where she is selling a greater range of products and acquiring more clients and communities.
 
She applied for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy additional mobile recharge cards in order to increase her sales. She hopes to expand her business to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional mobile recharge cards in order to increase for her sales.

loans.name: Tchilalo

texts.fr:
Tchilalo est une femme âgé(e) de 39 ans. Elle est mariée à un gendarme et a 02 enfants tous à l’école. Le premier a 11ans et le dernier 05ans.   
Tchilalo  comme travaille revendeuse de friperie depuis 2007. Elle vend de façon ambulante et achète à Lomé.
Tchilalo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bals de friperies. Elle veut avoir une boutique et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Tchilalo, age 39, is married to a police officer and the couple have two children aged 5 and 11 who both go to school. 

Tchilalo has been a reseller of second-hand clothing since 2007. She conducts her sales door-to-door, and she buys her merchandise in Lomé.

Tchilalo is seeking a first loan from WAGES to buy bales of used clothing. She wants to open a store and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bales of used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani is a 31-year-old married lady who has a son and a daughter. Her husband works as a driver.
Tahani has a small business embroidering traditional dresses. She want to add variety to the items she sells by making more items such as embroidered covers. Therefore, she has applied for a loan to buy more colourful threads and fabric.

loans.use: to buy more colourful threads and fabric.

loans.name: Adel

texts.en:
Adel is a 40-year-old single man. He decided to postpone having a family of his own to dedicate himself to his business and ensure its stability.
Adel owns an electronics shop where he sells mostly sound systems and other electronics parts. Now he is looking to import and obtain more branded electronics in order to expand his business. For this purpose, he has applied for a loan that will contribute to the cost of the import fees for those electronics.

loans.use: to meet the cost of import fees for electronics.

loans.name: Sok Meng

texts.en:
Sok Meng is 26 years old, married, and has one child.  She resides in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been breeding pigs for more than three years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a policeman who earns about $3 per day. 

Sok Meng wants to build a new house and is requesting a loan of $700, which she will use to purchase a plot of land. This money will help provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land to build a house.

loans.name: Sabrine

texts.en:
Sabrine is a 31-year-old divorced woman. She is currently living with her mother, who appears in the photo because Sabrine is a conservative woman.
Sabrine has been in the retail business for five years now. Every once in a while, Sabrine travels to the Aqaba Free Zone area to buy blankets and other products, which she brings back to her city to sell.
Sabrine’s dream is to become a well known trader in the future. To achieve her dream, she has applied for this loan to make another trip to Aqaba and purchase more products to offer more variety in what she sells.

loans.use: to purchase more products, such as blankets and home products.

loans.name: Leng

texts.en:
Leng is 43 years old and has three school-aged children. He dedicates himself in the construction field to provide an income for his family. He typically earns about $3.50 per day. He has been involved in this business for more than two years. 

Every day Leng comutes to work by taking a motor-taxi service. To reduce some expenses, he is requesting a loan of $1,000, which he will use  to purchase a motorcycle for home use as well as for commuting to his workplace. In the future, Leng hopes to own a place for repairing vehicles in his community.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for home use as well as for commuting to his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
Alvard lives in Partizak village with her husband and two sons. Her elder son and husband work at a stone mine, but their salaries are not enough to cover the family's costs. Therefore, the family also runs a farm where they breed cattle and cultivate land. Alvard wants to develop her family's farm.

Alvard is requesting a loan to purchase cows. Her loan will mean increased income for her family and she hopes to renovate her house and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cows

loans.name: Jameeleh

texts.en:
Jameeleh is a 47-year-old married woman. Her husband works in a private company. Most of her sons and daughter have got married.
Jameeleh owns a tailoring workshop where she tailor curtains and bed covers based on designs the customer asks for. She is planning on expanding her business and making a showroom for her work so she can reach more customers and curtain shops. For this purpose she has applied for a loan to buy new sewing machines, which will help her increase and accelerate her productivity.

loans.use: to buy new sewing machines.

loans.name: Alfatmia Group

texts.en:
This group is called ALFATMIA and is made up of three ladies, Myrvt, Randa and Frdos, who belong to the same savings group. They live in Aden, Yemen. This group is requesting financial assistance from Kiva partner AMB in order to raise their level of activity. They have applied for a loan of 210,000 YER.
Randa is the group's representative (she is in the middle on the photo). She is a 36-year-old married woman and has four children. She sells different items such as clothes, incense, etc. She started her business with goods she took on credit from merchants. She tries hard to improve her living conditions. To meet her customers' needs, and in order to increase her turnover and income, Randa is requesting a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB to buy additional clothes, incense, etc. for her business. She hopes to expand her business in order to improve it.

loans.use: to buy additional clothes, incense, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Yeranuhi

texts.en:
Yeranuhi is 45 years old and she lives in Goraik village with her daughter. She runs a farm where she cultivates potatoes and beans and she also raises cattle. Yeranuhi would like to develop her cattle breeding and improve her farm.

Yeranuhi is requesting a loan to purchase five calves, beech seeds and fuel for her tractor. With the help of her loan she will maintain her farm and expand it in the future.

loans.use: to pay for beech seeds, fuel, and calves

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is a young farmer from the Ashotavan community in the south of Armenia. He has been a farmer for the past seven years and has developed his farm with his hard work and favorable conditions. Davit lives with his wife and two children and grows potatoes and beans and raises cattle.
 
Davit is requesting a loan to purchase two cows and increase the number of cattle on his farm. His loan will increase Davit's income which is important to help this young farmer meet his family's needs. He hopes to insure a stable future for his family.

loans.use: purchase two cows

loans.name: Sohaam

texts.en:
Sohaam is a 45-year-old Iraqi woman who is married and a mother of three children. Living under modest conditions, she is using her sewing skills to help secure the family's monthly income. She has been working from home for the past two year making  dresses and other fabric household items based on customer orders.

Sohaam is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq to buy a new machine to improve her services and offer more to her customers.

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for her protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 50 years old. She lives in Kapan City in the south of Armenia, with her husband and son. Mairna's husband is a hairdresser and the couple started a beekeeping business five years ago. Now their farm includes seven beehives and their main income comes from making honey and selling it in the city. 

Marina is requesting a long to purchase beehives and develop her beekeeping skills. Her loan will provide a good opportunity for her to earn additional income which will help improve her household conditions and provide a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase beehives

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en: Gayane is 42 years old. She lives in Armash village with her husband, son, and daughter-in-law. Gayane's husband is 43 and works as a guard. Her son is 22 and works at a gas station. Gayane's daughter-in-law is 22. The main source of income for Gayane's family is agriculture: farming and cattle breeding. Gayane has applied for this loan to expand her farm. She wants to purchase a cow and five pigs. Gayane also wants to use the loan amount for purchasing fertilizer for the land cultivation. With development of agriculture Gayane expects increase of income, which is important for her to ensure prosperous conditions for her and her son's family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for a cow, five pigs, and fertilizer

loans.name: Salud Group

texts.en:
The village bank "Salud" ("Health" in English) is comprised of 17 enterprising members from Cusco, which is located in the Southern Andean mountains of Peru. Since their last loan, three members have left the village bank and three new members have joined.

One member is Catalina, who is in her 50s. About one year ago, Catalina opened a store selling natural health products, such as capsules made from plants and roots. Her loan will help Catalina purchase more products from a wholesaler in Cusco. Catalina used to sell salchipapas (a Peruvian dish made of fried potatoes and sausages) in the evenings but she no longer has time for that business now that she is focusing all her energy on her new venture. Catalina's store is currently located inside a block away from the street. She hopes that in the future she will be able to open another location in a storefront facing the street.

The other members of the village bank are teachers, public sector workers, secretaries, and vendors of stuffed animals, among other activities.

loans.use: to purchase natural health products

loans.name: Burastan

texts.en: Burastan lives in the town of Vayk with her husband and two children. Her husband used to be a soldier, but is now retired. For the last 10 years, the couple has worked as beekeepers. They now have 35 beehives and are requesting this loan to increase the number of hives so that they can have more honey to sell. Burastan plans to use the additional income to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to pay for 10 new beehives.

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen is 27 years old and lives in Davit Bek village with his mother. The main source of income for his family is cattle breeding. Karen sells meat and milk in Kapan city, the regional center. He is also involved in woodworking. Karen wants to develop his farm and get involved in pig breeding, too. 

Karen is requesting a loan to purchase pigs and forage. His loan will increase his agriculture income which will allow him to save and invest in developing his business.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and forage

loans.name: Vahan

texts.en: Vahan is a young farmer from Khndzoresk village. He runs a farm where he raises cattle: 7 cows and 15 sheep. Due to his hard work Vahan managed continually to increase the number of cattle. Now he wants to continue expansion of his farm. With the help of this loan Vahan will purchase three cows. This allows Vahan to receive more milk and meat, sell, and get additional income, which is important for him to meet his family's needs. Vahan lives with his wife, three little babies, and parents.

loans.use: to pay for three cows

loans.name: Maria Alejandrina

texts.es:
La señora Maria Alejandrina esta casada, tiene 35 años de edad, cursó los 2 años de educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio de gas propano, inicio este negocio por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para ampliar su negocio, la compra de mas gas, ya que lo que tiene es muy poco para la demanda que hay, espera en el futuro tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
María Alejandrina, 35, is married.  She completed the two years of primary education.  She has three children who are attending school.  She works selling propane gas.  She started this business on her own initiative and at the moment has six years of experience.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to expand her business buying more gas, because what she has is very little for the demand there is.

She hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.

loans.use: to buy gas.

loans.name: Saro

texts.en:
Saro is 35 years old. He lives in Harzhis village with his wife and three children. Saro is involved in agriculture and raises cows and sheep. 

Saro is requesting a loan to purchase two cows. He will also purchase grass to feed his cattle. Additional income is important for Saro to provide for his family's needs. He also supports his parents who live separately.

loans.use: to purchase two cows and feed

loans.name: Artsvik

texts.en:
Artsvik is 28 years old and lives in Kapan city with her husband, two daughters, in-laws, and brother-in-law and his wife. The main source of income for the family is agriculture and they keep poultry and grow fruits and vegetables in a greenhouse. 

Artsvik is requesting a loan to develop her family's agriculture business. She will use her loan to purchase hens, cattle, and forage. It is important for Artsvik to develop her farm as it will provide stable source of income and better future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase hens, cattle, and forage

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Yura

texts.en:
Yura is 28 years old and lives in Getap village with his wife, Lilit, and their two sons. He works at the local power station but unfortunately, his salary is not enough to cover his family's costs. Yura is also involved in cattle breeding and currently is raising two cows. His main source of income is the sale of dairy products and he wants to keep more cattle to increase his family's income. 

Yura is requesting a loan to purchase a cow and four pigs. His loan will greatly support his farm. Yura will use the profits from his loan to invest in the further expansion and development of the farm.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and four pigs

location.town: Getap village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Lorm

texts.en: Lorm, 40, is married and lives with her husband and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. For the last four years, she has worked in a garment factory where she earns $3 per day. Her husband is a construction foreman who earns about $5 per day. One of her children is a construction worker and earns about $4 per day. Lorm is requesting a loan for $200 to buy steel and cement to improve her house. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: improve her house.

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en: Saroeurn is 63 years old, married and lives with her husband and four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. For the last 10 years, she has earned a living by selling groceries, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband helps her run her business. One of her children is a garment worker who earns about $3 per day. Saroeurn is requesting a loan for $400 to rebuild her grocery store. This money will help her enlarge her store and make a larger amount of goods available to her customers. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. She also hopes to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family to live in.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to rebuild her store.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
La señora Candelaria  esta casada, tiene 57 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos ya grandes, se dedica al comercio de productos básico, inicio este negocio con poco capital y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de productos: azúcar, golosinas, jabones, aguas gaseosa, fideos, etc. Espera en el futuro tener una tienda mas grande.
texts.en:
Candelaria, 57, is married and has three grown children.  She did not have the opportunity to go to school.  She works selling basic products.  She started this business with little capital and at the moment has three years of experience.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to buy products: sugar, sweets, soap, soda, noodles, etc.

She hopes to have a bigger store in the future.

loans.use: to buy products for her store.

loans.name: Tet

texts.en:
Tet, 39 years old, is married and a widowed woman who lives with her older sister and three single children in a house, located in Kompong Tom province. She is a dealer selling fish from a rented booth in local market of Baray district. She gets fish from her frequent suppliers and other villagers who go fishing along Tonle Sap River. Tet owns a fishing boat and fishing materials and sometimes she goes fishing by herself with her older child for extra income.

To develop her present business, Tet would like to take out a loan through HKL to purchase a used motorcycle for home use as well as for her business purpose. She will be able to transport her fish to the market back and forth every day without taking any transportation services. Also, it’ll enable her to cut down some of her daily expenses. In the future, Tet hopes to enlarge her business, increase her household income, and provide a further education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle for home use as well as for her business purpose.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy thread for weaving typical indigenous clothing.

loans.name: Heshw's Group

texts.en:
Heshw is 35 years old, divorced, and has one child. With six years experience in the sewing and tailoring field, Heshw has been attracting clients with her high quality work, thereby ensuring the income for her and her child. 

In the past, Heshw successfully applied, received, and repaid a loan to Relief International - Microfinance Iraq, which she used to buy a sewing machine, iron, and iron stand. 

Focusing on improving her working conditions, Heshw is reqeusting a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq, which she will use to renovate her work area and purchase more quality fabrics and raw materials to further improve her business and offer more to her customers. 

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers group loans for clients unable to provide a guarantor, thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of three to five clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

loans.use: to improve her work area and buy quality fabric and raw materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to set up his business selling clothing.

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано – 29 лет, она не замужем. Кредитуется в нашей организации с 2009 года. Текущий кредит у Рано  четвертый по счету. Она ни разу не нарушала условие кредитования. Занимается торговлей постельного белья, полотенец, скатертей, салфеток, одеяло разного вида и размера. Опыт в этой деятельности около 5 лет. Так как начинается свадебный сезон, на полученный кредит хочет увеличить ассортимент товаров. Рано имеет 2 братьев и 1 сестру. Она старшая в семье и помогает своим родителям зарабатывая самостоятельно. Родители Рано выражают свою благодарность нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Rano is 29 years old and she is not married. She has been approved for receiving loans from our organization (MDO Arvand, LLC) since 2009. The current loan Rano is taking is her fourth. She has never violated the lending conditions. 

Rano is engaged in selling bed linen, tablecloths, napkins and blankets of different types and sizes. She has around 5 years of experience with this work. She would like to use the loan to increase the assortment of goods, as the wedding season is starting. 

Rano has two brothers and one sister. She is the oldest in her family and helps her parents by earning money independently. Rano's parents express their gratitude to our organization for the financial support.

loans.use: to increase her assortment of textile goods

loans.name: Gul

texts.ru: Гул вдова и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 11 лет она занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Начинала свой бизнес с продажи мелочевки. Особенности бизнеса в том, что точка находится возле центральной больницы в многолюдном месте. В бизнесе помогает дочка. Гул хотела бы получить займ в размере 5000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания с целью расширения ассортимента продуктов.
texts.en: Gul is a widow and raising two children.  She has been involved in buying and selling food products for over 11 years.  She started her business with the sales of small items.  The particularity of this business is the fact that the retail outlet is located near the central hospital in a populated area.  Her daughter helps her with the business.  Gul wants to obtain a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni to buy food products in order to expand the product selection.

loans.use: to buy food products in order to expand the product selection

loans.name: Safarbek

texts.ru: Сафарбек проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Сафарбек уже три года как занимается животноводством. В основном он откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Safarbek resides in the Shahrituz region. He is 41 years old, married, and has five children. For the past three years, Safarbek has been raising livestock. Mainly, he fattens and sells cattle. He is taking this loan to purchase calves in order to increase the size of his herd.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: El Futuro Group

texts.es:
El grupo El futuro lo conforman cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Martha es estilista desde hace 30 años tiene su pequeño salón de bella y vende cosméticos con lo cual ha sacado adelante a sus cuatro hijo de los cuales solo los dos menores de 16 y 14 años de edad están a su cargo.
Las otras integrantes son Zelia quien se dedica al dese cerdo y venta de sopa, Marta tiene una fritanga, vende tortillas y sopa, y Vilma tiene una venta desde hace 10 años.
texts.en:
The “El Futuro” (The Future) group is made up of four hardworking, enterprising people.  One of them is Martha who’s been a hair stylist for 30 years.  She has a small beauty salon and also sells cosmetics that has allowed her to raise her four children only two of which who are 16 and 14 years old are still dependent on her.

The other group members are Zelia who butchers pork and sells soup, Martha who sells fried food, tortillas and soup and Vilma who has been selling for the last ten years.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Rosa Madelia

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Madelia es casada, tienen 33 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a actividades pecuarias la crianza de animales domésticos y ganado, inició este negocio criando gallinas y pollos ponedoras, lleva 9 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la mecánica automotriz.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para ampliar su capital ya que va a compra mas animales para crianza esta vez para compra de toro, es en futuro espera contar con una granja.
texts.en:
Rosa Madelia, 33, is married.  She never went to school.  She has four children two of which are attending school.  She raises domestic animals and cattle.  She started the business raising chickens and laying hens.  She has nine years’ experience.  She has support from her husband who works as an auto mechanic.

She’s asking for a loan to expand her capital since she’s going to buy more animals to raise, this time a bull.  In the future she’d like to have a farm.

loans.use: to buy a bull.

loans.name: Dustbek

texts.ru: Дустбек с 2002 года занимается выращиванием лука, ячменя и огурцов. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Имеет 2 гектара земли, обрабатывает её и выращивает сельхозпродукты. Дустбек работает один и содержит свою семью в хороших условиях. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 4500 сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений, горюче-смазочных материалов и семян. Дустбек надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Dustbek has been cultivating onions, barley and cucumbers since 2002. He is married and is raising three children. His wife takes care of the household. Dustbek owns 2 hectares of land where he grows his crops. He works alone and manages to keep his family in good living conditions. He would like to obtain a loan of 4500 somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants, as well as seeds. Dustbek is hoping for your help and compassion.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, seeds, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Lemon Group

texts.es:
El grupo El limón lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Norman Alberto de 35 años de edad quien se dedica al comercio de ropa usada. Este negocio lo inicio hace 5 años en busca de sacar adelante a su familia, el está casado y tiene dos niños. 
Las otras integrantes son Daysi del Socorro de 49 años de edad quien vende hamacas desde hace 6 años y Mayra de 23 años de edad vende ropa usada desde hace 1 año.
texts.en:
The “El Limón” (The Lemon) group is made up of three hardworking, enterprising people.  One of them is Norman Alberto, 35, who sells used clothes.  He started the business five years ago looking for a way to move his family ahead.  He’s married and has two boys.

The other group members are Daysi del Socorro, 49, who has sold hammocks for the last 6 years and Mayra, 23, who has sold used clothes for the last year.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothes.

loans.name: Denis De Jesús

texts.es:
El señor Denis es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien es agricultor además se dedica al comercio de cosechas negocio que desempeña desde hace 20 años. El invertirá el crédito en la preparación de la tierra con la compra de insumos como urea, abono, limpia, y siembra. 
Denis es casado y tiene dos hijos ya mayores de edad.
texts.en: Denis is a hardworking, enterprising man who is a farmer; his business is producing harvests and he’s been doing this for 20 years.  He will use the loan to prepare the soil buying supplies like urea and manure and to clear and plant.  Denis is married and has two children who are now adults.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Eperanza Y Fe Group

texts.es: Doña corina tiene 35 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidario  Esperanza y Fe, es casada y madre de 4 hijos, su esposo se dedica al comercio de granos básicos. Doña Corina inicio hace algunos años con la venta de frutas y verduras, luego comenzó comprando productos de uso domestico y así pudo establecer una pequeña pulpería la cual poco a poco ha ido surtiendo, su horario de atención es de 6:30 am y cierra a las 8:00 pm. Las ventajas que tiene es que con las ganancias le da para sostenerse y seguir surtiendo el negocio. Una de las dificultades que tiene doña Corina es que los clientes le van a comprar cosas que ella no tiene y que no ha podido surtir en el negocio por falta de dinero. El préstamo lo necesita para invertir en la pulpería de más y variados productos como ser: azúcar, leche, arroz, manteca, frijoles, jabón, detergente, productos lácteos, refrescos, churros, dulces, etc. Ella espera que con el apoyo de este préstamo sus ingresos aumenten y así poder ayudar con el sostenimiento de su familia y también cancelar sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Corina, 35, is a member of the Esperanza y Fe solidarity group.  She is married and the mother of four children.  Her husband sells basic grains.

Several years ago Corina began selling fruits and vegetables.  Later she began buying household products and so was able to establish a small grocery store, which she has supplied little by little.  Her business hours are from 6:30 a.m., and she closes at 8:00 p.m.

The advantage she has is that the profits allow her to support herself and continue stocking the business.  One of Corina's difficulties is that the customers shop for things she does not have and that she has not been able to supply in her business for lack of money.

She needs the loan to invest in the store on more and varied products such as sugar, milk, rice, lard, beans, soap, detergent, dairy products, sodas, "churros" [fried dough], sweets, etc.

She hopes that with the help of this loan her income will go up and she will be able to help with the support of her family and also make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy general groceries.

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин. Более 8 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. В основном он выращивает лук, дыни и ячмень. Он имеет 2,5 гектаров поливной земли. В семье работает он сам. Его семья большая и дружная. Баходур запрашивает займ для покупки горюче-смазочных материалов, минеральных удобрений и семян. Баходур надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Bahodur is a kind and hard-working family man. For over 8 years, he has been growing crops - mainly onions, melons and barley - on 2.5 hectares of irrigated land. Bahodur is the only one in his family who works. His family is large and lives in harmony. Bahodur is requesting a loan to purchase fuel and lubricants, mineral fertilizers, and seeds. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Las Vegas Group

texts.es:
El  Señor Carlos, tiene 49 años de edad, es casado y tiene 4 hijos, Su actividad principal es la caficultura, El tiene 5 manzanas de tierras en su finca de café desde hace más de 26 años, el vive con su esposa y sus hijos, Don Carlos, esta solicitando el crédito para la siembra de una manzana de café, compra de fertilizantes, plaguicidas y pago de empleados,  para  mejorar la productividad de su finca ya que por la falta de financiamiento no le ha podido dar el mantenimiento adecuado.
con el crédito solicitado Don Carlos, le contribuirá a tener una mejor producción de café en su finca y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia como ser estudios universitarios a sus hijos y hacer una nueva casa que ofrezca todas las comodidades, el ha trabajado  muy duro para contar con un patrimonio familiar y su actividad requiere de trabajar muy arduo.
Don Carlos uno de sus sueños es tener una de los mejores fincas tecnificadas de la zona y darle una mejor educación a sus hijos.
Don Carlos es el líder del Grupo Solidario Las Vegas el cual cuenta con seis integrantes todos ellos se dedican a la misma actividad del café y han confiado en Don Carlos como coordinador del grupo ya que es una persona muy responsable y comprometida. La  Señora Mayra también cuenta con una pulpería ella no aparece en la fotografía ya que no pudo asistir a la reunión de sus compañeros. La Señora Delfida también tiene una pulpería cuenta con una experiencia de más de 18 años. El Señor Rene se dedica a la caficultora para sostener a su familia. El Señor Hebert se dedica a la Caficultura y su deseo es sacar adelante a su familia y El Señor Anastacio También se dedica a la Caficultura y a su familia.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras Marzo 2012
texts.en:
Carlos is 49 years old, married and has 4 children. His principal activity is growing coffee. He has had a coffee farm of 5 manzanas [7.35 acres] for more than 26 years. Carlos lives with his wife and their children. He is requesting a loan to pay for planting a manzana of coffee; buying fertilizers and chemicals and paying employees, in order to improve his farm's productivity. Lack of financing has been preventing him from performing adequate maintenance.

This loan will enable Carlos' farm to achieve better coffee production and, also, to produce better income to pay for household expenses, and provide a better quality of life for his family, including financing university study for his children and to help build a new house with all the conveniences. He has worked very hard to build up a family patrimony and these activities have required hard work. Among Carlos' dreams is to have one of the best and most technically modernized farms in his zone, and to provide a better education for his children.

Carlos is the leader of the 'Grupo Solidario Las Vegas' [Fertile Plains Solidarity Group], which has 6 members, all dedicated to the same activity, coffee growing. They have confidence in Carlos as the group's coordinator because he is a very responsible and committed person. Mayra [another member] also has a general store. She isn't in the photograph because she couldn't attend the meeting. Delfida also has a general store, with more than 18 years experience. Rene is a coffee grower who sustains his family. Hebert is also a coffee grower and his desire is to advance his family. Anastacio, too, is dedicated to coffee growing and to his family.

loans.use: buy fertilizers and chemicals, and to pay employees for cultivating coffee.

loans.name: Gs Nueva Betania Group

texts.es:
El  Señor Pablo, tiene 57 años de edad, Su actividad principal es la caficultura, el tiene 4 manzanas de finca de café desde hace más de 15 años, el vive con su esposa, Don Pablo esta solicitando el crédito para la siembra de café compra de fertilizantes, plaguicidas y pago de empleados  para la mejorar la productividad de su finca ya que por la falta de financiamiento no logra tener mas producción, con el apoyo solicitado del préstamo que reciba Don Pablo le contribuirá a tener una mejor producción de en su finca y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y ayudarla a salir adelante.
Don Pablo sus sueños es tener una de los mejores fincas tecnificadas de la zona, junto a sus compañeros de grupo.
El Señor Eduard, se dedica a la caficultura y cuenta con 5 años de experiencia. En el manejo de su finca.
El  Señor Milton, se dedica a la caficultura  cuenta con una experiencia de más de 3 años.
Ellos están muy felices con su grupo y en la fotografía aparecen muy contentos con su compañero Santiago.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Marzo 2012
texts.en:
Pablo is 57 years old and his main activity is growing coffee.  He has four manzanas [Central American unit of land measurement] of coffee plants he’s had for more than 15 years.  He lives with his wife and is asking for a loan for the coffee crops; he will buy fertilizer, bug killer and will pay day laborers to improve productivity because he’s unable to attain higher production for lack of financing.  With the support from the requested loan, Pablo will be able to produce more on his farm and obtain higher income to cover household expenses and give his family a better quality of life and help it get ahead.  One of Pablo’s dreams is to have one of the best technologically up-to-date farms in the zone along with his fellow group members.

Eduard is a coffee grower and has five years’ experience running his farm.

Milton is a coffee grower and has more than three years’ experience.

They are very happy with their group and in the photo they appear very happy with their fellow member, Santiago.

Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - March 2012

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and pay day laborers.

loans.name: Karomatullo

texts.ru: Кароматулло добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. С 2008 году он занимается купле- продажей скота и начинал бизнес с 1000 сомони. Он является владельцем данного бизнеса. На сегодняшней день в обороте имеет один крупный  и 5 голов мелкого рогатого скота.  Кароматулло хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Karomatullo is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and raising three children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Karomatullo has been involved in buying and selling livestock since 2008 and started this business with 1000 somoni.  He is the owner of this business.  Today, he has one head of cattle and five heads of small livestock.  Karomatullo wants to obtain this loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business.  He relies on your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Thea

texts.en: Thea, 21, is single and resides with his mother in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He has been employed in a rubber plantation for more than two years, earning approximately USD 4 per day. In order to improve his family’s living conditions, Thea wants to run an additional business. Due to lack of capital, Thea is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase farmland to use for cassava cultivation. This money will help him acquire the security to start the new business and generate more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to purchase more farmland to cultivate rubber and rebuild his present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to use for cassava cultivation

loans.name: Maria Dora

texts.es:
Maria Dora es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecer a sus 3 hijos una buena calidad de vida. Maria Dora se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos de 22, 15 y 10 años de edad. Debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, Maria Dora se vio en la obligación de generar ingresos con los cuales pueda contribuir económicamente para el sostenimiento de su hogar; fue así como montó su negocio de arreglo de uñas donde ofrece el servicio a domicilio, y gracias a esto ha logrado generar los ingresos con los cuales su familia puede gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. El negocio hace muy poco tiempo lo montó, sin embargo, en el corto tiempo ha logrado tener muy buenos clientes gracias a su buen servicio, y dado a que fue montado con muy bajo capital Maria Dora busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de esmaltes y demás insumos para realizar su trabajo.

De esta manera su negocio contará con más insumos para poder ofrecer un servicio completo a sus clientes, y así podrá captar un mayor número de clientes para su negocio. Además, Maria Dora espera que con mayores ingresos su familia acceda a una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Maria Dora is described as a very hardworking person who always wants to give her three children a good quality of life.  Maria Dora is married and has three children, ages 22, 15, and 10.

Because the income her husband generated was not sufficient to support the household expenses, Maria Dora was obliged to generate income with which to be able to contribute to the support of the household.  This was how she set up the manicure business she has in her home.  Thanks to this she has managed to generate the income with which her family can enjoy a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities.

She set up her business not long ago.  In a short amount of time she has managed to have very good customers thanks to her good service.  Given that she set up with very low capital, Maria Dora is looking for a loan that will give her to opportunity to buy nail polish and other supplies to carry out her work.

In this way her business will have more supplies to be able to offer her customers a complete service.  In this way she will be able to attract a greater number of customers for her business.  In addition, Maria Dora hopes that with more income her family will get a better quality of life and better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy nail polish and other supplies.

loans.name: Chhuon

texts.en:
Chhuon is 54 years old and is a married woman who is engaged in rice farming and in the hog-raising business to generate income. She has been doing these businesses for 12 years. She raises a few pigs for fattening in a wooden piggery in her yard for extra income. She has been blessed with five children; two are married and three are single. The three single children help her earn the income by weaving bamboo baskets with their father to better the living status.

At this time, Chhuon is asking for her third loan from HKL to purchase an additional five hogs for fattening and sale. With the remaining funds, she will buy a plot of farmland to expand her rice field and increase its production. Chhuon believes that this loan will enable her to make an improvement in the businesses and pursue a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase additional five heads of hog for fattening and sale.

loans.name: Rohat

texts.ru: Рохат женщина -предприниматель, которая имеет свой небольшой бизнес. Ей 56 лет, у неё 4 детей, 3 – дочери и 1 сын. Она – бабушка и очень этим гордится. Сотрудничает с нашей организацией с 2008 г. Занимается торговлей женской одежды и обуви. На полученный кредит планирует увеличить свой товарооборот, закупить сезонную обувь и женскую одежду. Муж Рохат тоже предприниматель и занимается торговлей строительных материалов. Они выражают свою благодарность нашей организации за финансовую поддержку. Благодаря поддержке нашей организации Рохат обустроила жизнь своих детей (выдала замуж 3 дочерей и женила сына).
texts.en:
Rohat is a female entrepreneur who has her own small business. She is 56 years old and has four children - three daughters and one son. She is also a grandmother and is very proud of this. 

Rohat has cooperated with our organization (MDO Arvand, LLC) since 2008. She is engaged in sale of women's clothing and shoes. She plans to increase her turnover with the loan received, by buying seasonal shoes and women's clothing. 

Rohat's husband is also an entrepreneur and he is engaged in sales of building materials. They express their gratitude to our organization for the financial support. Thanks to the support of our organization, Rohat has helped build her children's lives (married away her three daughters and her son).

loans.use: to purchase seasonal assortment of shoes and women's clothing

loans.name: Duo Santo Domingo Group

texts.es:
Duo Santo Domingo.
Doña Angela se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a la compra y venta de laurel, también se dedica a la crianza de animales, desde hace años ellas se dedica a sus actividades económicas para el sostenimiento de sus familias, ella diariamente se dedica a sus actividades porque tienen bajo su responsabilidad a sus hijos menores de edad, que necesitan ir a la escuela para que puedan tener una vida mejor, por eso solicita este crédito para poder surtir mas sus negocio comprar mas materia prima, para que ellas puedan obtener un poco mas de ganancias ya que hoy en dia todo es caro y a veces lo que sus esposos les dan no les alcanza para cubrir todas sus necesidades por eso esperan que este crédito sea de mucho beneficio para ella y toda su familia.
texts.en:
Santo Domingo Duo

Ángela hand weaves traditional textiles and is a bay leaf merchant; she also raises animals.  She’s been carrying out her economic activities to support her family for years.  She works at her activities every day because her minor children’s care is her responsibility; they need to go to school so that they can have better lives and this is why she’s asking for the loan to stock her business buying more raw materials so that she can earn a bit more profits since everything today is expensive and sometimes what their husbands give them isn’t enough to cover all their needs and this is why they hope the loan will be of great benefit for her and her entire family.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for hand weaving.

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.ru: Одилчон добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Более 3-х лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Каждую неделю ездит на рынок и покупает скот, затем откармливает их и продает за выгодную цену. Одилчон ухаживает и откармливает скот в своем доме и имеет хорошие условия. Он хотел бы получить займ для покупки крупного и мелкого рогатого скота с целью расширения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Odiljon is a kind and hardworking person.  He has been involved in buying and selling cattle and small livestock for over three years.  He travels to a market every week and buys livestock, then fattens it up and sells it at an advantageous price.  Odiljon takes care of and fattens up livestock at home and has good conditions for this.  He wants to obtain this loan to buy cattle and small livestock in order to increase his working capital.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle and small livestock

loans.name: Zarif

texts.ru: Зариф добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Имеет собственный лепешечный цех в своем селе, который занимается изготовлением и продажей лепешек. Имеет большой богатый опыт в данном бизнесе. Приобретает товары 2-3 раза в месяц на городском  рынке. Зариф запрашивает займ для ремонта своего цеха и покупки дополнительного оборудования. Зариф надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Zarif is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and raising three children.  He owns a flatbread bakery in his village, where he makes and sells flatbread.  He has a very rich experience in this business.  He buys products 2-3 times per month at a city market.  Zarif is requesting this loan to repair his bakery and buy additional equipment.  Zarif relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his bakery

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot is a 37 year-old entrepreneur from Vayk town, Armenia. Ashot is involved in beekeeping. Currently, he keeps 10 beehives. He also runs a little shop, where he trades with food. As a man with initiative, Ashot always aims to develop his enterprises, and thus has kept stable development of both businesses. Now Ashot plans to develop beekeeping by purchasing new beehives. 

He will use this loan to purchase 13 beehives. Ashot expects to increase his income, which he will invest for further expansion of beekeeping.  It is also important for him to meet his family's needs and provide better living conditions for them.

loans.use: to pay for 13 beehives

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru: Далер добрый и трудолюбивый юноша, ему 23 года. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Покупает скот на рынке, который находится вблизи дома и в течении 2-х недель откармливает их и снова перепродаёт. От данного бизнеса получает хороший доход. Далер хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнес. Далер надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Daler is a good and hard working young man, who is 23 years old. He has been engaged in buying and reselling livestock for more than five years. He buys livestock at the market, which is close to his home, and for a two week period he feeds them and then resells them. He receives a good income from this business. 

Daler would like to receive a loan for the purchase of livestock, with an aim to expand his business. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Solidario San Jose Group

texts.es:
SOLIDARIO SAN JOSE.
Marina se dedican a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura, ellas  tienen bajo sus responsabilidades a sus hijos ya que lo que su eposo ganan no le alcanza para sostenerse por eso ella tienen sus propios negocios para poder contribuir en los gastos de su casa,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de semillas y abonos para seguir con su siembra es por eso que ellas solicita este crédito porque necesitan un capital para poder ampliar un poco mas sus negocios y obtener mejores ganancias para el bienestar de sus familias ya que ellas viven en comunidades rurales y les cuesta mucho salir a buscar un dia de trabajo, esperan que este crédito sea de mucho beneficio.
texts.en:
SAN JOSE SOLIDARITY GROUP

Marina raises animals and she farms.   Their children are their responsibility because what their husbands earn doesn’t stretch far enough to support them and this is why they have their own businesses to contribute toward household expenses.

She’s asking for this loan to buy seeds and manure to continue with her crops; this is why she’s asking for the loan because they need capital to expand their businesses a bit more and obtain better profits for their families’ wellbeing since they live in rural communities and it’s very difficult to go out looking for a day of work.  They hope this loan will be of great benefit.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: El señor Juan tiene 55 años de edad, es casado y tiene 6 hijos, su esposa se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos, es una familia muy unida y trabajadora. Don Juan  se dedica al cultivo y venta de café, frijoles y maíz, actividad que realiza desde hace 20 años, el aprendió a trabajar desde muy pequeño ya que su madre era soltera y necesitaba ayudarla para poder sacar adelante a su familia, don Juan poco a poco fue ahorrando para comprar un terreno y poder sembrar y de ese modo es como en la actualidad tiene su finca de café que también siembra frijoles y maíz. Su horario de trabajo es desde las 5:00 am hasta las 2:00 pm y cuando es tiempo de cosecha es a tiempo completo.  Una de las ventajas que don Juan tiene es que ya tiene vendedores para el producto ya que este se le vende rápido. El préstamo que don Juan solicita lo requiere para la compra de fertilizantes, cemento y varilla, por lo que necesita hacer unas pilas y canales para recoger los granos de café. El préstamo le será de gran ayuda ya que ya que podrá pagar la mano de obra para poder sacar el café de la montaña y transportarlo. Su sueño es ser un productor mayorista y vender café de calidad. Este es su primer préstamo que solicita en FAMA y espera ser puntual con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Juan is 55 years old, married and has six children.  His wife does domestic chores.  They are a very united, hardworking family.  Juan grows coffee, beans and corn to sell, an activity he’s been doing for 20 years.  He learned how to work while still very young because his mother was single and needed help to support the family.  Juan gradually saved up to buy a piece of farmland and be able to plant and this is how today he has his coffee farm where he also plants beans and corn.  His work schedule is 5am to 2pm and when it’s harvest time he works full-time.  One of Juan’s advantages is that he already has sellers for his products so they sell quickly.

The loan Juan is requesting is to buy fertilizer, cement and rebar because he needs to build some tanks and canals to gather the coffee beans.  The loan will be of great use to him because he will be able to pay labor costs to do the project and move the coffee out of the mountain and transport it.  His dream is to become a wholesaler and to sell quality coffee.  This is the first loan he’s asked FAMA for and he expects to be punctual with his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, cement and rebar.

loans.name: Emin

texts.en:
Emin is 35 years old. He lives in Agarakadzor village, Armenia, with his wife and son. Emin runs a farm where he cultivates wheat, grows fruit and vegetables in a green house, and breeds hens and ducks. To start the cultivation of wheat, Emin needs to purchase the necessary forage and fuel for the agricultural machine. Emin also plans to develop cattle breeding, one of the reasons for applying for this loan. The loan will help Emin to purchase 15 bags of forage, 180 liters of fuel, and 2 calves. 
Development of agriculture will allow Emin to increase his income, which is vital for him to provide a stable future for his wife and son.

loans.use: to pay for 15 bags of forage, 180 liters of fuel, and 2 calves

location.town: Agarakadzor village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Pov

texts.en: Pov, 43, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than ten years, has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up animals. She earns approximately USD 12 per day. Her husband runs a taxi service. He earns about USD 50 per day. In order to improve her husband’s business, Pov is requesting a loan of USD 1500 to pay for car repayment and maintenance expenses. By doing so, her husband would be able to run his taxi service smoothly and attract more customers. In the future, she would like to purchase one more car for her son to run the taxi service as well.

loans.use: to pay for car reparation expenses

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en: Samvel is 40 years old. He lives in Masis, Armenia, with his wife and children. Samvel has been running a farm for 15 years. He keeps a greenhouse, grows peach trees and breeds poultry. Samvel needs some financial investment to start and complete land cultivation. With the help of this loan he will purchase tomato seeds and fertilizer. Samvel also wants to purchase food for the poultry. This will allow Samvel to continue successfully running the farm and providing financial stability for his family.

loans.use: to pay for tomato seeds, fertilizer and food for poultry

loans.name: Ry

texts.en:
Ry is 33 years old, married, and has three children.  She resides in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $6 per day. 

In order to help her husband's business, Ry is requesting a loan for $500, which she will use to purchase construction tools for her husband to use in his work. This money will help her husband run his business smoothly and enable him to construct bigger projects. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools for her husband to use in his work

loans.name: Davlatmurod

texts.ru: Давлатмурод женат и заботливый отец троих детей. Он добрый и воспитанный человек, который занимается купле- продажей женской одежды и тканей. Он успешно продолжает данный бизнес более пять лет. Он покупает товары из соседнего города 3- 4 раза в месяц. Давлатмурод хотел бы получить займ для покупки товара с целью расширение ассортимента товаров.  Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Davlatmurod is married and the attentive father of three children. He is a good and educated man, who is engaged in buying and selling women's clothing and fabric. He has successfully kept this business for more than five years. He purchases goods from the neighboring town three to four times per month. 

Davlatmurod would like to receive a loan for the purchase of goods with an aim to expand the assortment of goods. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to expand his assortment of goods

loans.name: Vache

texts.en: Vache is 27 years old. He lives in Kapan city with his family: wife, brother and little daughter. Vache works as a manager at a local firm.  In addition, he runs a farm in one of the nearby villages where he raises pigs. Vache has been running the farm for 5 years, and now keeps 23 pigs. Vache has applied for this loan to develop pig breeding. With the requested amount he plans to purchase pigs, as well as to pay for renovation of the barn. Development of pig breeding is absolutely vital for Vache to have a stable source of income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for pigs and barn renovation

loans.name: Phein

texts.en:
Phein is 35 years old, married, and has three children.  She resides in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling sweet cakes for more than four years, earning approximately $8 per day. Her husband is an arc welder who earns about $5 per day.  

In order to improve her husband’s business, Phein is requesting a loan for $600, which she will use to purchase an arc welding machine for her husband to use in his work. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase an arc welding machine for her husband to use in his work.

loans.name: Erkinjon

texts.ru: Эркинчон женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Еженедельно ездит на рынок для покупки крупного рогатого скота. Он откармливает скот в течении 5-10 дней хорошо ухаживает и в следующие неделю продает за хорошую цену. Эркинчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Erkinjon is married and raising a child. He has been engaged in buying and reselling cattle for more than 10 years. He goes to the market to buy cattle weekly. He fattens the cattle for 5-10 days, looking well after them, and in the following week sells them for a good price. 

Erkinjon would like to receive a loan for the purchase of cattle with an aim to develop his business. He hopes for your help and mercy.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Constitué exclusivement de 6 femmes mariées, les membres de groupe Danaya vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans et 2 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. 
Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, d’encens, du bois de chauffe,du  gingembre, de pagnes wax et bazins. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégrés  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 9ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame AMINATA (2ème debout à gauche sur la photo) est la vendeuse de wax et bazins du groupe. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 4pisses de pagnes wax et 2 pièces de pagnes bazins. 
Elle s’approvisionne auprès des grossistes et effectue ses  ventes en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à domicile et au marché, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Madame AMINATA compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 35.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et aider son mari dans  certaines dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
The six members of the Danaya group are married women living in traditional families. On average, they are 33 years old and they have two children each. They all live in the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali), and they know each other as neighbors and through ties of marriage and kinship. They sell incense, firewood, ginger, wax pagnes and bazin fabrics.

To increase their working capital, the group members joined the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution and are now seeking their 9th group loan. Mrs. Aminata (standing second from the left) is the one selling wax pagnes and bazins. She plans to use her loan to buy 4 pieces of wax pagnes and 2 pieces of bazins. She buys her merchandise from wholesalers and conducts her sales at retail, from her home and at the market, for cash or credit. Her clientele consists of both men and women.

Mrs. Aminata hopes that this loan will help her to earn an average monthly profit of 35,000 CFAF, which she will reinvest in her activity and use to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy wax pagnes and bazin fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Oimunos

texts.ru: Оймунос замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Более 16 лет она занимается купле- продажей женской и детской одежды. Имеет многолетний богатый опыт в данном бизнесе. Её дети учатся в школе, и она заботится о них. Оймунос старается создать условия для их обучения. Она также продаёт женские национальные платья. Оймунос запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки женских национальных платьев и летних тканей с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Oimunos is married and a loving mother of two children.  She has been involved in buying and selling women's and children's clothing for over 16 years.  She has a multi-year, rich experience in this business.  Her children attend a school, and she takes care of them.  Oimunos tries to create the best conditions for their education.  She also sells women's national dresses.  Oimunos is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 Somoni to buy women's national dresses and summer fabrics in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy women's national dresses and fabrics

loans.name: Mariela Getzabel

texts.es: Mariela tiene 28 años de edad es casada tiene una hija de 4 años de edad la cual es su inspiracion para realizar sus labores ella tiene un negocio de venta decomida por las mañanas la cual entrega en una fabrica de bordados cerca de su localidad y por las tardes se dedica a atender su venta de ropa americana esta muy agradecida por el apoyo brindado por kiva ya que sus ventas han mejorado y agradece la oportunidad y la confianza que le brindado,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa de segunda mano para la venta,el sueño mas grande es seguir ayudando a su madre y no alejarse de los cominos de Dios.
texts.en:
Mariela, 28, is married and has a four year old daughter who is her inspiration to work.  She has a business selling food during the morning that she delivers to an embroidery factory near her location and in the afternoon she sells American clothes.  

She’s very grateful for the support provided by Kiva because her sales have improved and she is grateful for the opportunity and the trust she’s been given.  She’s asking for this loan to buy second-hand clothes to sell.  Her greatest dream is to continue helping her mother and not to stray from God’s paths.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Vardan

texts.en: Vardan is a 45-year-old retailer from Armash village, Armenia. He runs a little shop where he trades with food and drinks. Vardan's two sons help him to run and effectively manage the business. He would like to increase the inventory level, for which he needs sufficient financial investments. This loan will help him to implement his goal and expand his business. Development of the business is important for Vardan and his family to have a stable source of income currently and for their families in the future.

loans.use: to pay for food.

loans.name: Duo Kairos Group

texts.es: Duo Kairos, Doña Marta es madre de 7 hijos la moyoria de ellos ya son mayores de edad ella se dedica a la elavoracion y venta de tejidos tipicos como güipiles y cortes, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 5 años,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos ya que nos cuenta que le falta capital para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Kairos Duo

Marta is the mother of seven children; most of them are now adults.  She works manufacturing and selling traditional woven fabrics like ‘güipiles’ [traditional Mayan blouses] and ‘cortes’ [textiles].  She’s been in this activity for five years and this is why she’s asking for this loan to buy raw materials to manufacture the textiles since she tells us that she needs capital to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to weave textiles.

loans.name: Heun

texts.en:
Heun, 41 years old, is married with seven single children, all living together with her and her husband in a suburban area of Phnom Penh city. She is a very responsible mother. She does almost everything that she can to sustain the needs of the family. She works in the rice field alongside her spouse and takes some free time to make palm sugar for sale. Her husband is the one who collects palm juice for her to make sugar. They help each other well because they want to ensure a good living standard and provide good education to their school-age children.

In order to get her house repaired in time, Heun discussed with her husband to take out a loan of USD 600 to purchase house building materials for the construction. She hopes to have a comfortable house protecting the family from the impact of the weather. Heun has received two loans from HKL and she paid them off already. This will be her third cycle loan.

loans.use: to purchase house building materials for house repair.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is a young woman who is excited to grow her business. It means that she will grab all the opportunity that lies in front of her including becoming a Loket Ruma agent. Currently, she runs her own business as an airtime and mobile phone seller and also has a small grocery kiosk that sells daily basic ingredients such as cooking oil, flour, eggs, etc. 

Although she is young, she was able to analyze that her airtime business is profitable. This is the main reason why she has taken the risk and challenge herself to expand the business to the next level. 

Becoming a Loket Ruma agent definitely will take the business to the next level, because it will bring more customers to Linda and hopefully will bring more income. She hopes people will use her Loket Ruma bill payment service business to pay PLN post paid or buy PLN prepaid electricity vouchers. With the loan that she will get from Kiva, she will pay the deposit for the device that will be used to enter the payment and create the receipt. The device is called an electronic data capture (EDC) and works like a mini ATM.

loans.use: to pay a deposit for an electronic data capture device for a bill pay business.

loans.name: Yun

texts.en:
Yun is married and has two children who are currently studying in a local primary school of the Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Yun is a rice farmer while her husband works as a chef's assistant, providing and serving a great quantity of food for the parties around the province. Also, Yun joins with her husband’s team for extra income when she gets free from her farming business, particularly in dry season.

Yun hopes to improve and strengthen her farming business and make it a viable source of income. Because she has insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 to purchase a cow for her farm and pay for its maintenance. She believes that her loan will enable her to reduce some operating expenses in the process of farming and make further improvement in her business.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for her farm and pay for its maintenance.

loans.name: Kolaban Group

texts.fr:
Kolaban est un regroupement de femmes du quartier de Sogomougou de la ville de Koutiala qui vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 38 ans, sont toutes mariées et mères d’au moins 4 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait essentiellement le commerce des fruits et légumes.  Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso il y a huit ans. Elles sont à leur quinzième prêt de groupe et tous les prêts précédents  ont été bien remboursés. 
Fatoumata, qui est la femme  assise devant les manges dans les deux mains, est un membre du groupe Kolaban qui vend des fruits et légumes.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter au fur et à mesure des chargements de charrettes en mangues. Elle se procure de ces fruits à Soumkounba Molobala et  Zangasso, les jours de foire. Elle vend ses fruits en gros et en détail au comptant à une clientèle diverse et variée. 
Tandis que Les membres du groupe  comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 110 000FCFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle, Mme Fatoumata compte réaliser 130 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses courantes de la famille. 
Elles souhaitent voir renforcer ce partenariat avec  Soro Yiriwaso pour pouvoir diversifier ces marchandises.
texts.en:
Kolaban is a group of women from the Sogomougou neighborhood of the city of Koutiala, who all live in large traditional families with their husbands, children and other relatives. Their average age is 38, and they are all married with at least four children.
This group of women essentially works in the sale of fruits and vegetables. To expand their activities, the members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program eight years ago. This is their 15th group loan, and all their previous loans have been correctly repaid.
Fatoumata, who is sitting at the front of the photo holding the mangos, is a member of the Kolaban group and sells fruits and vegetables.
She plans on using her loan to gradually buy cartloads of mangos. She obtains her fruit from Soumkounba Molobala and Zangasso on market days, and sells her produce on a retail and wholesale basis to a wide variety of customers, who pay in cash.
While the other members of the group plan to make an average profit of 110,000 francs CFA during this cycle, Fatoumata hopes to make a profit of 130,000 francs CFA.
In addition to repaying their loan, they also plan to use part of their income to meet their daily family expenses.
The group wants to strengthen its partnership with Soro Yiriwaso so that they can diversify their merchandise.

loans.use: To buy fruit.

loans.name: Soutoura (La Protection) Group

texts.fr:
Soutoura est un regroupement de femmes de Sogomougou qui se connaissent bien et qui  vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 36 ans, sont mariées et au moins 3 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels  les condiments et les légumes etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur premier prêt de groupe. 
Sali  qui a une assiette en main, est un membre du groupe Soutoura qui vend des condiments de toutes sortes (piments, oignon, poivre l’ail, Sounbala, fakoye, épice et divers autres).  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, dix sacs d’oignons dix sacs, deux cartons de concentrée de tomate et deux sacs de fakoye. Elle se procure  de ces  condiments à Koutiala et Sikasso avec les grossistes. Elle vend ses condiments en détail et au comptant au marché de Koutiala à la maison et en ambulant à une clientèle diverse et variée. 
Tandis que Les autres membres du groupe Soutoura  comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 60 000FCFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Sali compte réaliser 65 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fond de commerce. 
Elles souhaitent voir renforcée ce partenariat avec  Soro Yiriwaso pour que les stocks ne soient pas rares.
texts.en:
Soutoura is a group of women from Sogomougou, who all know each other well and live in large traditional families with their husbands, children and other relatives. Their average age is 36, and they are all married with at least three children.
The group’s members sell various articles such as spices, vegetables, etc.
To expand their activities, the members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. This is their first group loan.
Sali, who is pictured holding a dish in her hands in the photo, is a member of the Soutoura group who sells all kinds of seasoning (capsicum, onion, pepper, garlic, soumbala, fakoye, spices and others).
She plans to use her loan to buy ten bags of onions, two cartons of tomato concentrate and two bags of fakoye. She obtains her seasonings from wholesalers in Koutiala and Sikasso, and sells them for cash on a retail basis at Koutiala market, door-to-door and on the street to a wide variety of customers.
While the other members of the group plan to make an average profit of 60,000 francs CFA during this cycle, Sali hopes to make a profit of 65,000 francs CFA
In addition to repaying their loan, they also plan to use part of their income to meet their personal expenses and expand their business.
