The products will be sold at retail prices in order to generate more income for her family and money for school fees for her children. She hopes to upgrade her business through her strong determination, for she believes that with this, she will be able to succeed in all her goals in life.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice and animal feed to resell.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine is 43 years old and has a retail shop where she sells a variety of products. She has had this business for 4 years. She is married and has 3 school-aged children. Catherine is requesting a loan of Php 20,000 to purchase canned goods, soft drinks, and other basic commodities to sell. Each month, she earns about Php 5,000 doing this type of work. In the future, Catherine hopes that her business will improve to be able to support the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft drinks and other commodities to sell.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en: A very hardworking and loving mother, Jessica is 33 years old and married with four grown up children. She has been engaged in a retail business for four years to have additional income to sustain the needs of her family. For that reason she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy a variety of products such as canned goods, spices and rice for her business. She hopes that someday her business will expand so that she can fill the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, spices and rice for her business.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is from the village of Villaluz. She is thirty years old. Jennifer is married and has two school-aged children. To make a living, Jennifer runs a general store. The main source of income for the business comes from selling a variety of different products to the local community. Jennifer is a loving person and loving mother. 

Jennifer joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Jennifer is requesting a new loan of 16,000 Philippine pesos (PHP), which will be used to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, spices and breads for her store.

loans.name: Efrelyn

texts.en:
Efrelyn is from the village of Villaluz. She is twenty-nine years old. Efrelyn is married. To make a living, Efrelyn owns and operates a transportation business. The main source of income for the business comes from providing motorcycle transport to local members of the community. Efrelyn has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns approximately 2,500 PHP a month for these activities.  

Efrelyn is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her motorcycle business.

loans.name: Jose De La Rosa

texts.es: Don José tiene 61 años de edad, es casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 7 hijos, de los cuales solo uno depende de don José, también tiene 2 nietos a su cargo. El y su familia residen en la comunidad de las cañitas, departamento de Olancho. Don José desde hace mas de 30 años se dedica a la siembra de café, maíz y frijoles, oficio que aprendió de su padre desde que era muy joven, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 am a 2:00 pm, todos los días va a supervisar la finca de café por si hay alguna plaga. La ventaja que tiene don José es que el cultivo de café le deja buenos ingresos que son con lo que sostiene a su familia. El problema que se le presenta es que no hay entrada para los vehículos ya que el vive en una montaña y se le dificulta trasladar el producto. Don José solicita el préstamo para la compra de abono,  fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra en la temporada de la cosecha de café. Estos préstamos le han ayudado en gran manera ya que compro una maquina para moler café y esto le ha causado mayores beneficios a su familia. Uno de sus sueños es tener mayor producción de café, una casa en mejores condiciones y ver a sus hijos profesionales. Es el segundo ciclo en fama y ha cancelado puntualmente sus cuotas de pago.
texts.en: José is 61 years old. He is married, and his wife dedicates herself to the household tasks. He has 7 children, of whom only one still depends on José. He also has 2 grandchildren in his care. He and his family live in the community of Las Cañitas, in the department of Olancho. For more than 30 years, José has worked growing coffee, corn and beans, a profession he learned from his father when he was very young. His working hours are from 7:00 am to 2:00 pm. Every day he goes to check on the coffee plantings and see if there are any pests. The advantage José enjoys is that coffee growing gives him good income, which is what he uses to support his family. The problem he faces is that there is no access for vehicles, since he lives on a mountain, and it is difficult to transport his products. José is requesting the loan to buy compost and fertilizer and to pay for labor during the coffee harvest season. These loans have helped him greatly, since he bought a machine to grind coffee, and this has brought substantial benefits to his family. His dreams include expanding his coffee production, having his house in better condition, and seeing his children become professionals. It is his second loan cycle with FAMA, and he has made his payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Ladis Orlando

texts.es: Orlando tiene 28 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, es casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Orlando era empleado de una empresa de café, el sembraba, abonaba y cortaba el café, fue asi como aprendio a cultivar cafe, de su salario empezó a ahorrar y decidió poner su propia finca de café, su suegro le regalo 2 manzanas para que cultivara el café y gracias a Dios le ha ido muy bien, desde hace 4 años se dedica a la cosecha de café, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am a 1:00 pm, y cuando es tiempo de la cosecha contrata 10 empleados ya que el trabajo es mayor y la finca necesita de mayor cuidado. La ventaja que tiene es que la cosecha le deja muy buenas  ganancias y  las dificultades que se le presentan a don José es que los vehículos no entran hasta su finca por lo que se le dificulta el traslado del producto. El préstamo que solicita don José lo necesita para mejorar su finca, en la compra de abono y fertilizantes. Uno de sus sueños es tener mayor solvencia económica para mejorar su casa y hacerla mas grande, también poder comprar mas tierras para cultivar mas café y ver graduados a sus hijos. Este es el segundo préstamo que obtiene de FAMA y ha cancelado de forma puntual sus cuotas.
texts.en: Orlando is 28 years old, has two children, and is married. His wife works tending the home. Orlando was an employee of a coffee company. He planted, fertilized, and harvested the coffee beans, and that is how he learned to grow it. He began to save his wages and decided to start his own coffee farm. His father-in-law gave him two plots of land for farming coffee and, thanks to God, it has gone well for him. He has been farming coffee for four years and he works from 6:00 am until 1:00 pm. During harvest he hires 10 employees since it is a big job and the farm needs greater care. The advantage of his job is that it gives him good earnings and the difficult part is that vehicles cannot enter into his land so it is difficult to transport the crops. He will use the loan to improve his farm by buying fertilizers. One of his dreams is to be economically solvent to improve his home and add on to it. He also wants to buy more land to raise more coffee, as well as see his children graduate. This is the second loan he has received from FAMA and he was punctual with the loan payments.

loans.use: buy fertilizers

loans.name: Maximino

texts.es: Don Maximino tiene 52 años de edad, es casado y tiene 3 hijos, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la cría de gallinas. Ellos residen en la comunidad de las cañitas, departamento de Olancho. El comenzó trabajando con una hermano y poco a poco fue ahorrando para comprar su finca y luego empezó a sembrar maíz, frijoles y café, desde hace 20 años se dedica a este oficio, su horario es de 6:00 am hasta la 1:00 pm todos los días va a la finca a cuidar de las plagas la cosecha de café. La ventaja que tiene don Maximino es que cada año la cosecha le deja buenos ingresos y con la ganancia compra una manzana de tierra y una bestia mular, también que el producto lo van a traer hasta su finca, los inconvenientes que se le presentan es que en la montaña no entran los vehículos por lo que el producto lo tiene que trasladar en bestia, y que en algunas ocasiones entra la plaga y tiene que combatirla con fungicidas. El préstamo que don Maximino esta solicitando lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes, abonar la tierra de la finca y chapearla para que este limpia. Con la ayuda de los prestamos logro comprar las puertas de su casa y cercar su propiedad. Uno de sus sueños es mejorar su casa, que sus hijos sean profesionales y poder tener mayor solvencia económica para comprar mas tierras y cultivar mas café. Este es el segundo crédito que obtiene de FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Mr. Maximino is 52 years old, married, and has three children. His wife works in the home and raises chickens. They live in the community of Las Cañitas, in Olancho. He started out working with his brother and, little by little, saved enough to buy a farm to grow corn, beans, and coffee. He has done this work for 20 years and works from 6:00 until 1:00 pm every day. He goes to the farm to fight plagues and harvest coffee. The good part of his business is that each year the harvest gives him good income and with his earnings he buys another plot of land and a mule, also that the products will be delivered to his farm. The inconveniences he faces are that vehicles cannot drive in the mountainous area so they have to transport products by mule, and sometimes he has to fight plagues with fungicide.

Maximino is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers to fertilize his farmland and clean it up. With the help of the loans he was able to buy doors for his house and fence in his property. His dreams are to improve his house, for his children to be professionals, and to have greater economic solvency to buy more land and grow more coffee. This is the second loan he has gotten from FAMA and he has been punctual with the payments.

loans.use: buy fertilizers

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастура жительница Яванского района. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Она занимается шитьем национальных платьев у себя дома. В этой области она 8 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения новой швейной машинки.
texts.en: Mastura is a resident of the Yavan district.  She is 48 years old, married and has five children.  She is involved in sewing national dresses at home.  She has been in this business for eight years.  Mastura is requesting this loan to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Yusufkhon

texts.ru: Юсуфхон житель района Хамадони. Ему 47 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Юсуфхон предоставляет услугу. Он развозит пассажиров по маршруту Душанбе-Хамадони. В этой области он восемь лет. Кредит берет для приобретения автомашины марки STAREX.
texts.en: Yusufkhon is a resident of the Hamadoni district.  He is 47 years old, married and has five children.  Yusufkhon provides a service.  He transports passengers along the Dushanbe-Hamadoni route.  He has been in this business for eight years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase a Starex model car.

loans.use: to purchase a Starex model vehicle

loans.name: Sirojiddin

texts.ru: Сирочиддин житель Яванского района. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Сирочиддин занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Sirojiddin is a resident of the Yavan district.  He is 34 years old, married and has four children.  Sirojiddin is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for two years.  He is requesting this loan to buy bulls.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Bobomurod

texts.ru: Бобомурод проживает в городе Истаравшан. Возраст, 25 лет. Женат. Имеет двоих детей. Бобомурод занимается посевом риса и выращиванием овощей. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Bobomurod lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 25 years old, married and has two children.  Bobomurod is involved in sowing rice and growing vegetables.  He has been in this business for six years.  He is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah, 45 years old and a married woman, has a family of six members. Her husband owns a pick-up truck and works in a transporting and distribution business.

Sarah decided to make use of a small area at her house to sell food products. As it appears in the photo, she has built special shelves to put the products on, so they could be organized and easy to reach.

Now Sarah has applied for this loan to bring in more products that are not related to food such as tissues and kitchen products.

loans.use: to bring in more products that are not related to food

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Рустам арендует помещение, где открыл национальную столовую (чойхона). Сам он работает поваром в чайхане. В основном он готовит шашлыки. В этой области он восемь лет. Кредит берет для покупки мяса, шампур и необходимой посуды.
texts.en: Rustam lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 43 years old, married and has three children.  Rustam leases a space, where he opened a national cafe (chaihana).  He works as a chef in the chaihana and primarily cooks shish kabobs.  He has been in this business for eight years.  Rustam is requesting this loan to buy meat, skewers and necessary dishware.

loans.use: to buy meat, skewers and necessary dishware

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy used clothes.

loans.name: Aurora Group

texts.es:
La señora esta casada, tiene 32 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 1 hijos el cual esta estudiando, se dedica a la crianza de animales, inicio este negocio con la crianza de pollos y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien la apoya económicamente.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de una vaca y cerdos, y así poder tener una ganancia cuando crezca estos animales, espera tener una granja con varios animales. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio, servicios, y a la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
The lady is married and is 32 years old.  She did not have the opportunity to attend school.  She has one child who is in school.   She raises animals.  She started the business raising chickens and to date has six years’ experience.  She has her husband’s economic support.

She organizes a group to request a loan she’ll use to buy a cow and pigs to earn higher profits when these animals grow.  She hopes to have a farm with several animals.

The other group members are merchants, provide services and raise animals.

loans.use: to buy a cow and pigs.

loans.name: Gs La Prosperidad Group

texts.es:
El Señor Hedilberto tiene 48 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos, Su actividad principal es la venta de abarrotería (pulpería) y de hot dog  desde hace más de 4 años, el cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y de sus hijos en el manejo del negocio, Don Hedilberto vive con su familia en el departamento de Danli al oriente de Honduras.
Don Hedilberto con su negocio a salido adelante ya que ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos, la pulpería la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación y la venta de hot dog lo hace de manera ambulante, en las gasolineras u otros lugares, y los fines de semana el lleva en su vehiculo las dos carretas que tiene a los diferentes campos de fútbol de las comunidades cercanas, con el crédito solicitado del préstamo que reciba Don Hedilberto le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio ya que comprara embutidos, verduras, granos basicos, pastas, carnes, condimentos, pan, salsas y otros productos para la venta, y así obtener mejores ingresos para cubrir los gastos en el hogar, y así tener una mejor calidad de vida el y su familia.
Don Hedilberto Sueña con que sus hijos se gradúen y tengan una vida mejor.
La Señora María se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de abarroteria (pulpería) y la venta de golosinas tamalitos, elotes, fritas de elote.
El Señor Pedro, se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de pescado seco y la toma de fotografías.
Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - Marzo 2012
texts.en: Mr. Hedilberto is 48 years old and has four children. His principal activity is selling groceries and hot dogs, which he has been doing for over four years. He has the support of his wife and children in running the business. Hedilberto lives with his family in the department of of Danli, in western Honduras. With his business, Hedilberto has been able to get ahead, as it has been his principal source of income. His pulpería [grocery store] is located in his home and he sells the hot dogs in an itinerant manner, at gas stations and other locations. On the weekends, he uses his car to take his two hot dog carts to different soccer fields and nearby communities. The money that Hedilberto receives from the loan he is requesting will contribute to improving his business, as he will buy sausages, vegetables, basic grains, pastas, meat, condiments, bread, sauces, and other other products to sell. This way, he will earn better income to cover his household expenses and he and his family will have a better quality of life. Hedilberto dreams that his children will graduate and have a better life. Ms. María works in commerce. Her principal activities are selling groceries in her pulpería and selling sweets, tamales, corn on the cob, and fried corn. Mr. Pedro also works in commerce. His primary activities are photography and selling dried fish. Danli El Paraíso, Honduras - March 2012

loans.use: to buy sausages, vegetables, basic grains, pastas, meat, condiments, bread, sauces, and other products to sell

loans.name: Emerita Dolores

texts.es: Emerita tiene 4 hijos a sus 31 años de edad. Nació en Portoviejo pero vive en Buena Fe-Quevedo. Es madre soltera y sus hijos asisten a la escuela fiscal. Hace 13 años compro una casa e inicio su negocio. Comenzó a vender artículos hechos de fieltro por iniciativa de una amiga quien le enseño hacer manualidades. Esmerita trabaja sola y en sus ratos libres ya que hace poco tuvo una operación del riñón, esto hace que su salud sea un poco delicada. Nos cuenta que sus hijos son su apoyo, su motivación diaria para seguir adelante.  Desea aumentar sus producción es por ese motivo que solicita el préstamo para comprar fomix, fieltro y tela para hacer sus manualidades. Nos cuenta que su sueño es muy ambicioso ya que le gustaría ser distribuidora a nivel nacional.
texts.en:
Emerita, 31, has four children.  She was born in Portoviejo but lives in Buena Fe-Quevedo.  She’s a single mother and her children attend public school.   

Thirteen years ago she bought a house and started her business.  She started out selling items made of felt through the initiative of a girlfriend who taught her how to make crafts.  Emerita works alone and in her free time since she recently underwent kidney surgery which has her in a delicate state of health.  

She tells us that her children are her support and her motivation to continue forward every day.  She wants to increase production and this is why she’s asking for a loan to buy foam, felt and fabric to make her crafts.  She tells us that her dream is very ambitious because she’d like to become a distributor on a national level.

loans.use: to buy foam, felt and fabric.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en: Teresa is a woman with determination and a hardworking attitude. She has two grown children. She manages a store in their community. She is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy a variety of products to offer in the community. In the future, Teresa hopes that her business will expand so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional products for her store

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is 60 years old and a married woman. Her husband has already retired from his work.

Huda has a small food products store at home where she sells snacks, tea bags, sugar, salt, etc. Her husband often helps her especially after his retirement.

She has applied for this loan to buy more food products such as macaroni, food in cans, and others so she can have more variety in what she sells.

loans.use: to buy more food products

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es: Jorge es un portovejense que realiza transporte de mercadería a vendedores de legumbres en triciclo. Anteriormente recorría la ciudad vendiendo granizados pero se dio cuenta que esto no mejoraba sus ingresos por lo que se decidió cambiarlo. Jorge tiene 56 años y es casado. Vive en Portoviejo con su esposa y sus  4 hijos. Nos cuenta que 3 de sus hijos son propios, el cuarto es de una hija que falleció y el lo adopto. Tiene 14, 12, 8 y 6 años de edad y asisten a la escuela fiscal. Su horario de trabajo empieza desde las 6 am hasta las 12 am y luego de 3 pm a 6pm todos los días. No tiene muchas dificultades en su trabajo pero si le preocupa un poco su salud, aunque dice ser más duro que una roca. El préstamo lo desea principalmente para mejorar su viviendo que es de ladrillo. Y su meta en 5 años seria comprarse una tricimoto para darle descanso a sus piernas y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge is from Portoviejo.  He works transporting merchandise to vegetable merchants on a three-wheel cart.  He used to travel throughout the city selling shaved ice treats but he realized that this wasn’t improving his income so he decided to change it.

Jorge is 56 years old and married.  He lives in Portoviejo with his wife and four children.  He tells us that three of the children are his and the fourth is actually his daughter’s who died and he adopted him.  They are 14, 12, 8 and 6 years of age and attend public school. 

His work schedule begins at 6am and ends at noon and then again from 3pm until 6pm every day.  He does not have many difficulties in his work but he does worry a little about his health although he says he’s harder than a rock.

He wants the loan mainly to do some improvements to his brick house.  His five-year goal is to buy a motorcycle-powered card to give his legs a rest and improve his quality of life that way.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement and rebar.

loans.name: Maryjane

texts.en: Mary Jane is a young married woman. She is 22 years old with two school aged children. Her spouse works as a farmer in the community. She is engaged in selling different products in the community. In order to meet the needs of her family, she needs to expand her business so that she can give her family better living conditions. Mary Jane is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy a variety of products that she can offer in the community.

loans.use: to buy additional products for her business

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is a 31-year-old woman from the village of Danipa in the province of Isabela.

To earn a living, for the past two years she has managed a grocery store. She is a very patient and hardworking person.

She is asking for a loan in the amount of 10,000 PHP to buy additional products to sell in the community, which should allow her to generate additional income to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell in the community

loans.name: Anzurat

texts.ru: Анзурат жительница города Исфара. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она занимается торговлей на рынке. В основном Анзурат продает детскую одежду. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Anzurat is a resident of the city of Isfara.  She is 40 years old, married and has three children.  She is involved in sales at a market.  Anzurat primarily sells children's clothing.  She has been in this business for two years.  She is requesting this loan to expand her merchandise selection.

loans.use: to purchase children's spring suits

loans.name: Humberto Alino

texts.es: Humberto es un padre de familia de 26 años. Hace 1 año 2 meses que nació su hija e indica ser la luz de sus ojos. Nació en Valencia pero vive en Quevedo en una casa familiar. Es bachiller pero no a podido conseguir trabajo. Como tiene familia emprendió un taller de soldadura le iba bien pero no ganaba lo necesario así que invirtió en ropa y calzado. El negocio no lo tiene ubicado en su casa ni local, recorre la cuidad o el campo ofreciéndolos. Es agotador ya que sale a las 6 de la mañana de su casa regresando solo en la noche. Nos indica que extraña a su familia pero es su trabajo y lo hace pensando en ellos. No ha tenido mayores inconvenientes con robos, como su esposa es ama de casa en ocasiones le acompaña. El préstamo lo requiere para invertir en zapatillas, ropa y suministros de hogar. Su sueño es tener un local y vehículo para ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Humberto, 26, is a father.   His daughter was born a year and two months ago and he says she’s the light of his life.  He was born in Valencia but lives in Quevedo in a family home.  

He’s a high-school graduate but has been unable to find employment.  Since he has a family, he started a welding shop.  He did well but didn’t earn enough so he invested in clothes and footwear.  

His business isn’t located at home or in a locale.  He travels throughout the city or the countryside selling his wares.  It is exhausting because he heads out at 6am not returning home until nighttime.  He tells us that he misses his family but it’s his work and he does it with them in mind.  He hasn’t had any major inconveniences like robberies.  Since his wife’s a housewife she accompanies him sometimes.  

He needs the loan to buy sandals, clothes and supplies for the home.  His dream is to have a locale and a vehicle to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy clothes and sandals.

loans.name: Alba Laura

texts.es: Alba es soltera y tiene 30 años de edad. Nació en Guayaquil y no tiene hijos. Hace 16 años con esfuerzo y sacrificio compro su casa con lo cual se siente muy satisfecha. Su mamá vive con ella y como es costurera le enseño el trabajo. Alba es bachiller pero indica que es  difícil encontrar trabajo. Como su madre tiene maquinas y con un capital propio se decidió a emprender su negocio. Ella confecciona y vende sabanas y toallas. Nunca pensó que lo que empezó como un negocio pequeño para solventar sus gastos se convirtiera en un medio de vida para ella y sus familiares quienes trabajan ahí. Nos indica que en su negocio no hay tiempo determinado como bueno o malo, lo que se le complica es la temporada de invierno ya que las calles donde vive no están pavimentadas y se inundan lo que complica su transportación. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar 2 maquinas industriales y aumentar su capacidad de producción. Su meta inmediata es adquirir 2 maquinas adicionales para agrandar su taller.
texts.en:
Alba is 30 years old and single. She was born in Guayaquil and has no children. Sixteen years ago, with effort and sacrifice, she bought her house, with which she feels very satisfied. Her mother lives with her and as she is a seamstress she taught her the work. Alba has a bachelor's degree but points out that it is difficult to find work.

Because her mother has machines, and with her own capital, she decided to start her business. She makes and sells sheets and towels. She never thought that what she started as a small business to pay her expenses would become a way a life for her and her friends who work there. She points out that in her business weather isn't determined to be bad or good, but what complicates things is the winter season, because the streets where she lives are not paved and they flood, which complicates her transportation.

She will use the loan to buy two industrial machines and increase her production capacity. Her immediate goal is to acquire two additional machines to make her workshop bigger.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Khley

texts.en:
Khley is a 49-year-old married woman, residing with her husband and their four children in Battambang Province, Cambodia.

She has been selling boiled corn and groceries for more than ten years. By doing so, she earns approximately $6 per day. Her husband grows rice and raises pigs, which allows him to earn approximately $6 per day as well. Two of their children are employed -- one is a teacher, while the other is a construction worker -- and they also earn approximately $6 per day.

In order to improve her family’s standard of living, Khley is requesting a loan in the amount of $500 to purchase more corn to boil in order to generate more sales to her customers. As a result, she would be able to generate more profits to support her family. In the future, she would like to use the expected profits she hopes to generate from the loan proceeds to expand her business and to help her children receive bachelors' degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase additional corn

loans.name: Silvia Johanna

texts.es: Silvia tiene 31 años, está casada con Sergio. Tienen 2 niños de 11 y 12 años que asisten a la escuela fiscal.  Viven con sus padres en Libertad. Su esposo tiene 4 años trabajando como guardia de seguridad ganando el sueldo básico. Nos cuenta que en varias ocasiones se han visto en problemas económicos y por eso ella decidió empezar a vender comidas preparadas. Le fue bien pero pasado en tiempo la competencia bajo sus ingresos. Fue en la fiesta de uno de sus hijos que Silvia se dio cuenta que por su sector no vendían globos ni piñatas así que decidió emprender ese negocio. No cuenta que no ha tenido problemas con los robos ya que su barrio es tranquilo, entre bromas nos comenta que también puede ser, que como su esposo es guardia de seguridad y lo conocen no haya sufrido de inconvenientes. El préstamo lo necesita básicamente para incrementar  su negocio comprando sorpresas, piñatas y una vitrina. En el futuro desea tener su casa propia y una sucursal de su negocio en el centro.
texts.en:
Silvia, 31, is married to Sergio.  They have two boys who are 11 and 12 years old attending public school.  They live with her parents in Libertad.  

Her husband has been working as a security guard earning minimum wage for four years.  She tells us that they’ve had financial problems on several occasions and this is why she decided to start to sell prepared food.  She did well but as time went by her income dropped due to competition.  

It was at one of her son’s parties that she noticed that in her neighborhood there was no place selling balloons or piñatas so she decided to go into this business.  She tells us that she’s had no problems with robberies since her neighborhood is peaceful.  She adds facetiously that since her husband’s a security guard and he’s known maybe that’s why she’s had no inconveniences.  

She needs the loan basically to increase her business buying surprises, piñatas and a display case.  In the future she’d like to have a house of her own and a branch of her business downtown.

loans.use: to buy a display case, piñatas and surprises.

loans.name: Reth

texts.en:
Reth is a 49-year-old married woman, residing with her husband and their two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia.

She has grown rice and raised cattle for over ten years, and earns approximately $4 per day from these activities. Her husband is a soldier who earns approximately $3 per day. One of her children is a garment worker who earns approximately $4 per day.

In order to improve her farming operations, Reth is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase more cattle to use in her farming work as well as to re-sell for profits once they gain weight. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for farming and re-sale purposes

loans.name: Chhy

texts.en:
Chhy is a 45-year-old married woman, residing with her husband and five children in Battambang Province, Cambodia.

She has been selling shaved ice for over a year, and earns approximately $5 per day in doing so. Her husband is a construction worker who earns approximately $4 per day. Three of her children are construction workers, and they earn approximately $9 per day.

In order to improve her family’s living conditions, Chhy is requesting a loan in the amount of $300 to purchase gasoline for resale purposes. By doing so, she would be able to earn extra income to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and to help her children receive bachelors' degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more functional for her family’s daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase gasoline to re-sell

loans.name: Ana Melva

texts.es: Ana es madre soltera, tiene 39 años. Nació en Jipijapa pero actualmente vive en Guayaquil. Hace 12 años dejo su ciudad natal, compro una casa en la zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la Flor. Tiene 1 hijo de 16 años que asiste al colegio fiscal. Nos cuenta que cuando vino a vivir a Guayaquil se le hizo un poco difícil adaptarse ahora le gusta mucho la cuidad por lo cual no tiene pensado regresar a Jipijapa. Su negocio lo empezó antes de mudarse con una máquina de coser regalo de una tía a quien ayudaba. Ana nos comenta que este tipo de negocio no tiene un horario fijo pero tiene sus beneficios ya que le permite estar en su hogar. No tiene ayudantes aunque si hijo le ayuda cuando tiene una entrega grande y no se abastece sola. No comenta que si le preocupa la delincuencia porque su sector es un poco peligroso y no tiene respaldo policial. No se queja le va bien en su negocio y eso se demuestra ya que ahora tiene 3 maquinas de costura. El préstamo lo va a invertir en una maquina industrial y telas ya que con la época estudiantil tiene demanda. Su meta próxima es mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Ana, 39, is a single mother.  She was born in Jipijapa but currently lives in Guayaquil.  She left her native city 12 years ago, bought a house in the periurban zone called Paraíso de la Flor and she has a 16 year old son attending public school. She tells us that when she went to live in Guayaquil it was a little difficult to adapt but now she likes the city very much so she does not plan to return to Jipijapa.  

She started her business before she relocated with one sewing machine an aunt who helped her gave her.  Ana tells us that this type of business does not have a fixed work schedule but it does have its benefits because it allows her to be at home.  She does not have any helpers although her son helps when she has large orders to fill and can’t do it all herself.

She comments that she does worry about crime because her neighborhood is a bit unsafe and does not have police presence.  She can’t complain though; she does well in her business and that’s proven by her now having three sewing machines.

She will use the loan to buy an industrial sewing machine and fabric because the school term brings demand.  Her next goal is to make some improvements to her house.

loans.use: to buy fabric and sewing machines.

loans.name: Jenny Elizabeth

texts.es: Jenny es del Guayas. Tiene 28 años está casada y aun no tiene niños. Vive en la Coop. 25 de julio en el Suburbio de Guayaquil, su vivienda es de caña pero es propia. Empezó el negocio de comidas gracias a su hermana ya que es a ella a quien le vende el desayuno, almuerzo y merienda para los trabajadores de su zapatería. Jofre su esposo vende gas a domicilio y también le ayuda con la venta. Nos cuenta que su horario empieza muy temprano ya que debe ir al mercado a realizar la compra de los productos con los que elabora la comida. La mayor dificultad que tiene es su casa por ser pequeña  el espacio que tiene para su venta es reducido. Con el préstamo va a comprar una cocina industrial, sillas y mesas así aumentaría sus ventas y podría empezar a construir su casa de cemento.
texts.en:
Jenny is from Guayas.  She’s 28 years old, married and does not have children yet.  She lives in Cooperativa 25 de Julio in Suburbio, Guayaquil.  Her house is made of sugarcane stalks but it’s hers.  

She started the business of preparing meals thanks to her sister since she’s the customer for the breakfasts, lunches and dinners she prepares the employees in her sister’s shoe store.  Her husband, Jofre, sells gas house to house and also helps her with her sales.  

She tells us that her schedule begins very early because she must go to the market to buy the products she’ll need to make the meals.  The greatest difficulty she has is due to her house being so small and the space she has available is reduced.  She will use the loan to buy an industrial stove, tables and chairs to increase sales and start to build her concrete block house.

loans.use: to buy an industrial stove, tables and chairs.

loans.name: Freddy Neptali

texts.es: Freddy nació en Charapoto, parroquia de Manabí. Cuando conocimos a su familia nos llevamos una pequeña sorpresa, Freddy tiene 7 hijos 4 de ellos están en la etapa escolar. Lidia su esposa no trabaja ya que tiene que cuidar a sus hijos. Su negocio lo empezó cuando se comprometió empezó sembrando y vendiendo cebollas en el mercado, lleva 25 años en el negocio y le va bien. Trabaja los sábados en el mercado mayorista y el domingo en Charapoto. La única dificultad que tiene es el espacio físico en el mercado de Charapoto por lo que tiene que ocupar la vía pública en las ferias. Con el préstamo va a comprar tomate y pimiento ya que quiere aumentar sus ganancias y poder arreglar su casa y abrir un local del mercado.
texts.en:
Freddy was born in Charapoto, a parish in Manabí.  When we met his family we got a little surprise: Freddy has seven children four of them school age.  His wife, Lidia, does not work because she has to take care of her children.  

His business started when he became engaged.  He started out planting onions to sell in the market; he’s been in business 25 years and does well.  He works Saturdays at the wholesale foodstuffs market and Sundays in Charapoto.  The only difficulty he has is the physical space in the Charapoto market because he has to occupy space in the public thoroughfare during the street markets.  He will use the loan to buy tomatoes and peppers to increase profits and be able to fix his house and open a stand in the market.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes and peppers.

loans.name: Isroiljon

texts.ru: Исроилчон проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается торговлей на рынке. Он в основном занимается торговлей мужской обуви. Этим видом деятельности занимается 20 лет. Кредит берет для покупки весенней и летней обуви.
texts.en: Isroiljon lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 43 years old, married and has seven children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Isroiljon is involved in sales at a market.  He primarily sells men's shoes.  He has been in this business for 20 years.  He is requesting this loan to buy spring and summer shoes.

loans.use: to buy spring and summer shoes

loans.name: Akhmad

texts.ru: Akhmad jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Yemu 26 let. Akhmad jivet v Fizuli regione, on yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas on projivayet vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. On uje 5 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit ovec. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit ovec dlya razvitiya i uvel;icheniya svoyego biznessa. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego otca kotoriy toje zanimalsya skotovodstvom.
texts.en: Akhmad is married and has two children.  He is 26 years old.  Akhmad lives in the Fuzuli region.  He is an IDP from the city of Fuzuli and now lives together with his wife and children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for five years and breeds sheep.  Currently, Akhmad needs 2000 AZN to buy sheep for developing and expanding his business.  He learned this business from his father, who is also involved in animal husbandry.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Moyesso

texts.fr: Mayesso est une femme de 35ans. Elle est mariée à un revendeur et a 03 enfants dont 02 à l’école. L’ainé a 09ans et le dernier 03ans. En 2005, Moyesso a démarré l’activité de la vente de miel. Elle le vend à la maison et les distribue aux clients en cas de besoin. Elle est à son second crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter du miel.  Elle veut épargner les profits, l’agrandir l’activité et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en: Moyesso is a 35-year-old woman.  She is married to a merchant and has three children, two of whom are in school.  The oldest is nine years old and the youngest is three.  In 2005, Moyesso began selling honey.  She sells from her home and also delivers if customers need it.  She is on her second loan through WAGES and is requesting this loan to buy honey.  She wants to use the profits for savings, to enlarge her business, and to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy honey.

loans.name: Elchin

texts.ru: Elchin yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fizuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. On jenat i imeyetet odnogo sina. Elchin 26 let. Kak vidite na fotografii on zanimayetsya skotovodstvom, uje 4 goda kak on razvodit korov. Elchin nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya razvitiya svoyego dela, uvelicheniya molochnogo produkta i uludsheniya mesachnix doxodov dlya semyi. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego starshego brata kotoriy pomog yemu nachat etot bizness.
texts.en: Elchin is an IDP from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with his family.  He is married and has one son.  Elchin is 26 years old.  As you can see on the photograph, he is involved in animal husbandry and has been breeding cattle for four years.  Elchin needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cattle for developing his business, increasing milk volumes and improving his family's monthly income.  He learned his business from his older brother, who helped him to start this business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Ahmadjon

texts.ru: Ахмаджон мужчина в возрасте 59 лет.Умный,пунктуальный и трудолюбивый человек,которого все знают и уважают в селе.Ахмаджон уже 25 лет занимается откормом скота , а также он выращивает сельхозпродукции (помидор,горох и кукуруза) и знает все трудности и преимущество в бизнесе. Ему помогают его дети а жена домохозяйка.На полученный займ Ахмаджон хочет закупить 2 голов молодых баран для откорма.Ахмаджон кредитуется в организации "Арванд" с 2010 года и ни разу не имел случаев просрочке и надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Ahmadjon is a 59 year-old man.  He is a smart, punctual and hardworking person, whom everyone in the village knows and respects.  Ahmadjon has been involved in fattening up livestock for 25 years and also grows agricultural crops (tomatoes, peas and corn) and knows all of the difficulties and advantages of this business.  His children help him, and his wife is a homemaker.  Ahmadjon wants to buy two heads of young rams for fattening up.  Ahmadjon has been obtaining financing from "Arvand" since 2010 and has never had an occasion of a late payment.  He relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Wilson Rene

texts.es: Wilson es casado, tiene 40 años de edad, tiene 6 hijos y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, el y su familia residen en la comunidad de las cañitas, en el departamento de Olancho. Wilson desde hace 10 años inicio sembrando café con el apoyo de sus padres ya que le dieron la tierra para que cultivara café, maíz y frijoles, actualmente se dedica a la cosecha de granos básicos, el trabaja solo e inicia su horario laboral de 6:00 am hasta la 1:00 pm y en temporada de cosecha lo hace a tiempo completo, tiene que buscar empleados por la cantidad de trabajo que hay siendo que no se da abasto el solo. La ventaja es que tiene buena producción de grano de café aunque le pagan el producto a un  bajo precio. El préstamo que el Sr. Wilson esta solicitando lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, para chapear y mejorar la finca. Con la ayuda de este préstamo podrá mejorar su finca y tendrá mayores ganancias que le ayudaran al sostenimiento de su familia.  Su meta es poder tener mas parcelas de tierra para cultivar café y ver a sus hijos graduados. Este es el segundo préstamo que obtiene en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Wilson is 40 years old, married, and has six children. His wife makes a living in domestic work. He and his family live in the community of Las Cañitas, in the department of Olancho. 

Ten years ago Wilson began planting coffee with support from his parents who gave him the land to plant coffee, corn, and beans. He currently makes his living harvesting basic grains. He works alone and his work day lasts from 6:00am to 1:00pm. During the harvest season he works full time. Due to the quantity of work there is, he needs to find employees because he cannot do it alone. The advantage is that he enjoys good coffee bean production even though he is paid a low price for his product. 

Wilson needs the loan he is requesting to invest in the purchase of manure, to clear the land, and to improve the farm. With the help of this loan he will be able to improve his farm and have a better income which will help him support his family. His goal is to be able to have more plots of land to grow coffee and to see his children graduate. This is the second loan he has received from FAMA and he has made his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Don Francisco, es casado, tiene 62 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos  y vive junto a ellos en su propia casa de habitación en el departamento de Valle en el sur de Honduras. El negocio de Don Francisco es la venta de pan dulce, pan blanco y galletas por mayor ya que tiene clientes preferenciales de algunos Mercaditos y Pulperías de Nacaome  y San Lorenzo en la zona sur de Honduras.
Don Francisco esta solicitando la cantidad de 10,000.00 lempiras para la compra de pan dulce, pan blanco, galletas y llantas para su vehículo, con esta inversión tendrá mas producto para la venta y también tendrá seguridad en su vehiculo con llantas nuevas así lograra mayor desempeño en su negocio y sus clientes se sentirán atendidos, por lo que sus ingresos serán mejores.
Don Francisco entre sus sueños a futuro esta la idea de realizar algunas mejoras a su vivienda.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo 2012
texts.en: Francisco is 62 years old, married, and has three children. He lives with his children in his own home located in the department of Valle in the south of Honduras. Francisco has a business selling pan dulce [sweet baked goods], white bread, and cookies, wholesale. His preferred customers are a few small markets and corner stores in Nacaome and San Lorenzo, in the southern area of Honduras. Francisco is requesting a loan of 10,000.00 lempiras to buy pan dulce, white bread, cookies, and tires for his vehicle. He will have more products to sell with this investment and will also be able to feel secure in his vehicle with new tires. This way he will be able to better carry out his business and his customers will feel well attended resulting in a better income. Among Francisco's dreams is the idea of making some improvements to his home. San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2012

loans.use: to buy pan dulce, white bread, and cookies to improve his business.

loans.name: Dagny Dolores

texts.es: Dagny tiene 33 años y vive en La Liberta. Es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Termino el colegio se caso es ama de casa y administradora. Dagny nos indica que el negocio en realidad es de su esposo, el es quien siempre se a dedicado a la construcción, juntos abrieron el almacén y lo administran. Empezaron con algo pequeño pero con esfuerzo y dedicación han progresado de tal manera que ahora trabajan de lunes a domingo sin descanso ni vacaciones. Sus hijos están en la etapa escolar asistiendo a la escuela fiscal. Tener el negocio le ha dado muchos beneficios tanto económicos como personales ya que puede dedicarles tiempo a sus hijos. Son responsables con sus pagos, trabajadores y dedicados eso se demuestra porque este sería su 4 crédito en el banco. En esta ocasión compraran inventario para su tienda como varillas, cemento, arena, tubos, piedra. Ven sus metas realizadas día a día pero les gustaría en un futuro tener una casa más grande y enviar a sus hijos a la universidad
texts.en: Dagny is 33 years old and lives in La Libertad. She's married and has 4 children. She finished school and then got married. She's a homemaker and a manager. Dagny reports that the business actually belongs to her husband, who has always been in the construction business. Together they opened and run the warehouse. They started out small, but with hard work and dedication they made such progress that they currently work from Monday through Sunday without rest or vacations. Their children are schoolaged and attend public school. She has benefitted a lot from her business, both financially and personally, because she's able to spend time with her children. They are hardworking, dedicated and responsible with their repayments, which is demonstrable by this being their 4th loan with the bank. On this occasion, they will purchase merchandise to stock up their warehouse, such as rods, cement, sand, pipes and rocks. They see their goals achieved everyday, but in the future they would like to own a larger house and send their children to college.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks and pipes.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
El señor Abel de 44 años de edad, es casado, tres hijos dependen de el cuyas edades son de 17, 14,11 años, el vive en una colonia de la ciudad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 9 años a la venta de helados, su venta la realiza de manera ambulante sale de mañana todos los días en su motocicleta a visitar las escuelas, parques y lugares en donde hay presencia de niños ya que son sus clientes mas potenciales.
Don Abel Solicita 8,000.00 lempiras para la compra de ice crean, conos, vasitos, paletas y cremitas que son los productos que sus clientes prefieren, con el préstamo Don Abel desea continuar trabajando y de esa manera proveer mas ingresos para su familia.
El sueño de Don Abel es darles una mejor educación a sus hijos y construir su casa ya que vive en casa de un familiar y le gustaría tener casa propia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2012
texts.en:
Abel, 44, is married and has three dependent children: 17, 14 and 11.  He lives in a neighborhood in San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras.  For the past 9 years he has sold ice cream as a street merchant.  He starts mornings on his motorcycle visiting schools, parks and places where there are children since these are his best customers.
Abel is requesting 8,000 lempiras to buy ice cream, cones, ice cream in cups, popsicles and frozen yogurt that are the most popular products.  Abel will use the loan to continue working and provide earnings for his family.
His dream is to give his children a better education and to build his own house since they currently live with family.
San Lorezo, Honduras, March, 2012

loans.use: to buy ice cream, cones, ice cream in cups, popsicles and frozen yogurt to sell

loans.name: Yeurn

texts.en:
Yeurn, 65, is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling sizzling cake (stuffed savory fried pancakes) for more than four years, earning approximately USD 10 per day. Two of her children are employed. They are a motor taxi driver and a garment worker. They earn about USD 8 per day. 

Yeurn wants to build a kitchen and a bathroom. With this goal in mind, Yeurn is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase construction materials to build the kitchen and the bathroom. This money will help her provide hygienic living conditions for her family. 

In the future, she would like to run a tailoring store at home for her daughter and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen and a bathroom.

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn, 39, is married, and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than seven years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about USD 5 per day. Her children are still in her care and in school. 

In order to develop her family’s economy, Saroeurn is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she would earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to use to the profit to expand her business and help her children get bachelors' degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell.

loans.name: Rath

texts.en:
Rath, 50, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction foreman. He earns about USD 5 per day. All of her children are still in her care and in school. 

In order to improve her husband’s business, Rath is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase construction tools for her husband to use in his work. This purchase will help her husband run his business smoothly. 

In the future, she would like to expand her husband’s business and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools for her husband to use in his work.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is 47-years-old, married, and is the father of five children. He is a hard-working man who has fought to provide for his family and educate his children. 

Rolando is asking for a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to buy seed to grow and fertilizer for his farm. Rolando is an enterprising man who constantly tries to do things better and to improve, day after day. He works hard in his fields where he spends as much time as possible providing the necessary care, fertilizing his land and spraying to prevent that diseases that might affect his yield. He sells his crops to the trader.

loans.use: to buy seed to grow and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Kim Sron

texts.en:
Kim Sron, 56, is married and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling porridge and Khmer noodles for more than three years, earning approximately USD 6 per day. Her husband runs a public transportation service (motor taxi). He earns about USD 4 per day. 

Because the present motorbike is too old, Kim Sron is requesting a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run the taxi service. This purchase will help her husband attract more customers and earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run the taxi service.

loans.name: Phen

texts.en:
Phen, 57, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in an agricultural business for more than twenty years, has extensive experience and is successful in her career.

She is involved in growing vegetables and fattening up animals. She earns about 6 USD per day. Her husband is a retired soldier and helps her run the business. His retirement salary is about 3 USD per day. Two of her children are employed in a gas station. They earn about 5 USD per day.

Phen is requesting a loan of 1,500 USD to pay for her child’s wedding expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to pay for her child's wedding expenses

loans.name: Thary

texts.en:
Thary, 24, is married and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been running a tailoring shop for more than three years, earning approximately 5 USD per day. Her husband is a mechanic who earns about 13 USD per day.

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Thary is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase motorbike spare parts for her husband to resell. This purchase will help her husband generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and help her child get a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to purchase a flat to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase motorbike spare parts for her husband to resell

loans.name: Searb

texts.en:
Searb, 40, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for more than seven years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Her husband runs a taxi service (motor taxi). He earns about 9 USD per day. One of her children is employed as a garment worker and earns about 5 USD per day.

Because the present motorbike is too old, Searb is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run the taxi service. This purchase will help her husband attract more customers and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run a taxi service

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en:
Sokhom, 36, is married and resides with her husband and five children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been running a rubber plantation for more than ten years, earning approximately 20 USD per day. Her children are still in her care and in school.

In order to improve her business, Sokhom is requesting a loan of 1,500 USD to purchase more rubber plants to cultivate. This purchase would enable her to produce more rubber and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber plants to cultivate

loans.name: Sunly

texts.en:
Sunly, 39, is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling cake for more than three years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Two of her children are employed in a rubber plantation. They earn about 8 USD per day.

Sunly wants to run an additional business in order to improve her family’s economy. Due to lack of funds, Sunly is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase fertilizer and rubber plants to grow. This money will help her acquire the security to start the business. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest child get a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and rubber plants to grow

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
At age 42, Rosalina still operates a small store selling grocery items to the people in her village. She has been doing it for over five years. Her spouse works as a farmer and earns about PHP 5,000 each month. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 7,000 to have additional capital to invest in her store. She will buy sardines, biscuits, eggs and soap to sell.

Rosalina has one school-aged child. She is hoping to give the best education to her child to get good employment someday.

loans.use: to buy sardines, biscuits, eggs and soap to sell in her store.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 50 years old, married, and had three children. To generate an income, she cooks and sells food for daily meals and snacks. She has been doing it for 10 years and shows commitment to her business and her family as well.

She would like to keep ensuring delicious food to sell so she is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy meat, carrots, onions, and garlic to use in her food-selling business. 

She hopes to make her business more profitable and achieve economic stability someday.

loans.use: to buy meat, carrots, onions, and garlic to use in her food-selling business

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz and her family live in Centro Norte. To make a living, her spouse works as a carpenter while she raises hogs to fatten and sell in the future. The couple have five children. Luz has been raising hogs for almost five years. She usually earns about P3,000 for each hog disposed. 

She is now asking for a loan of P6,000 to buy feed and medicines for the hogs to achieve good growth and nutrition.

Someday, she hopes to make the business more profitable and save for her children's educations.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicines for the hogs

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is patiently selling fruits and vegetables to the people in her village. She is offering it on a house-to-house basis. Fe has been in her business for 10 years. She is thankful for her daily income from the business, which is used for her family's sustenance for meals. She has six children and is married to Felix, a carpenter.

She is now asking for P5,000 to buy cabbages, eggplants, tomatoes, and beans to sell. This will help improve her sales. 

In the future, Fe would like to make her business more profitable and allot funds to use in times of emergencies.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, eggplants, tomatoes, and beans to sell

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon raises hogs in order to earn an income. She has been doing it for over three years now. She is 26 years old and has one child. She is married to a farmer. She is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy hog feed and vitamins for sustainability. 

Someday, she hopes to keep developing her business to earn good profits for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and vitamins for sustainability

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is raising pigs to sell upon achieving the desired growth. She has been in this kind of business for almost five years and earns approximately P3,000 for each hog disposed. She has two children attending to their high school educations. She hopes to send them up to college to earn degrees. She is now borrowing a loan of P5,000 to buy feed and vaccines for the hogs' sustainability. 

Zenaida is also praying for continuous profits from her business for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for hogs' sustainability

loans.name: Elyn

texts.en:
Elyn is 32 years old and has two children attending school. She has been operating her small store for two years now. She would like to increase her income, so she is borrowing a loan of P5,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, biscuits, and shampoo to sell in her store.

Someday, she hopes to make the business more profitable to save for her children's educations.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, biscuits, and shampoo to sell in her store

loans.name: Thoeurn

texts.en: Thoeurn, 26, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than two years, earning approximately USD 15 per day. Her husband is involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up animals. He earns about USD 5 per day. In order to develop her business, Thoeurn is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she would earn more profits to support the family and help her children get bachelors' degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell

loans.name: Sarath

texts.en:
Sarath, 46, is married, and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been running a food store for more than ten years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. Her husband is a tractor driver who earns about USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sarath is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase more chairs and tables to put in her store. This purchase will help her expand her store and provide enough space for her clients, and make more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and help her child get a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase more chairs and tables to put in her store.

loans.name: Khim

texts.en:
Khim is 35 years old and married with three children. They are all residing in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is a local rice farmer who owns and manages a few hectares of land for rice cultivation, while her husband works in the construction field to provide a daily income for the family. Khim has been working in this type of business for almost 22 years.

She would like to borrow some funds from HKL to purchase construction supplies to support her husband’s business. This loan will enable her husband to provide his building services and increase their household income. For the future, Khim hopes to enlarge her farmland and continually expand her business for a good standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies to support her husband’s business

loans.name: Sor

texts.en:
Sor is 50 years old from Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. She is married to her husband, who works in the same type of business as a local farmer cultivating various kinds of crops, like rice, beans, corn, and vegetables, depending on the season. This couple has given birth to five children. Four of them are already married, while the other one is still single and lives with her in a house.

To improve her business, Sor would like to take out a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase a threshing machine, which will allow her to ensure a good quality of her work performance. Also, she can provide this service to local farmers for extra income. She believes that her business will further improve through the  constant help from our lenders providing her a loan.

loans.use: to purchase a threshing machine

loans.name: Nein

texts.en:
Nein, 57, is married, and resides with her husband and a son in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for more than twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a carpenter who earns about USD 10 per day. Her son is a construction worker who earns about USD 5 per day. 

Nein wants to build a bathroom. Due to the lack of funds, Nein is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase construction materials to build the bathroom. This money will help her provide hygenic living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase constrution materials to build the bathroom.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan, 54, is from Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. She is in the business of cultivating rice on her existing farmland with her husband to generate her daily income. She has been involved in this business for more than 20 years. Presently Chan is responsible for 3 single children, who all live together with her under the same roof.

With the sum of KHR 500,000, Chan will use it to pay for the preparation of a religious ceremony for her elderly mother. This kind of ceremony is celebrated to show respect and thankfulness to parents who are getting old. Chan hopes that our lenders won’t reject her second loan. She is very grateful for the great help.

loans.use: to pay for the preparation of a religious ceremony for her elderly mother

loans.name: Aun

texts.en:
Aun is a farmer living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is raising crops, primarily planting and harvesting rice for sustenance and sale. She works hard to generate an income of USD 5.00 per day to cover her daily expenses, as she is now a single woman and lives alone. She has been in this business for a long time. 

Aun plans to renovate her house in order to secure her living condition. Due to the financial shortage, Aun is now looking for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 to supplement her capital in order to build a strong ladder and fix some parts of her house.

She hopes to have a suitable and comfortable house to live in. For her business goal, she wants to expand her rice farming business and increase her production.

loans.use: to supplement her capital in order to build a strong ladder and fix some parts of her house.

loans.name: Rahmatjon

texts.ru: Рахматджон 1948 года рождения, женат имеет 2 сыновей и одну дочь. Рахматджон находиться на пенсии, но он не сидит сложа руки. У него есть небольшой участок земли, где он выращивает огурцы и тыкву. Он трудиться с утра до вечера. В выращивании овощей помогает его любящая жена. Первый кредит поучал для постройки этого же парника. Теперь ему необходим кредит для постройки гаража.
texts.en: Rahmatjon was born in 1948. He is married, and has 2 sons and one daughter. Rahmatjon is retired, but he is not staying idle. He has a small plot of land where he grows cucumbers and squash. He works morning til night, and his loving wife helps him grow the vegetables. Rahmatjon's first loan was used to construct a greenhouse for his vegetables. Now he needs another loan to build a garage.

loans.use: to build a garage

loans.name: Sum

texts.en:
Sum is 48 years-old and a married woman who has been residing in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham. The main source of her income is generated from different businesses: cultivating rice, making grinders from raw mortar, and trading ripe tamarinds. Sum has six children, five of whom started their new families while her last-born child lives with her and is in need of her allowances.

As of now, Sum has applied for a loan to purchase raw mortar for the purpose of making grinders and mortars and pestles. This loan will enable her to make sustainability of her income. With the increase in her income, she wants to reinvest in her businesses to better her living standard.

loans.use: to purchase raw mortar for the purpose of making grinders and mortars and pestles.

loans.name: Bun

texts.en:
Bun is a 36 year-old loving mother who is responsible for six children, all of whom are unmarried and attend local schools in Prey Chor, Kompong Cham province. Bun has been managing her rice farming business for almost twelve years, earning an average of USD 1.50 per day. Her husband is very supportive and helpful in managing the maintenance of the rice filed. Also, he devotes part of his time to collect and buy recycled materials from local people in his commune and sell them to the recycling industry for extra income. 

Recently, Bun’s family is experiencing financial difficulties that effect the businesses and her living status. In order to make the family sustainable, Bun would like to take out a loan of KHR 600,000 to support her husband’s business and keep sufficient capital to buy recycled materials. She hopes to make this business more profitable through using the loan from HKL.

loans.use: to support her husband’s business and keep sufficient capital to buy recycled materials.

loans.name: Kean

texts.en:
Kean, 42 years-old, has been a hardworking farmer for almost 22 years. She lives with her family: her husband and three unmarried children in Kompong Cham province, while her oldest child lives separately with his new family. Kean generates her income from land cultivation with her spouse. Agriculture is the main source of her income. Kean grows various kinds of crops such as rice, potatoes, bean and vegetables based on the season and the market demand. She works at the rice field non-stop from one season after another to ensure a quality of life for the family. With her income, Kean provides her children with daily sustenance and school allowances. She wants them to earn a degree so that they will be employed someday. 

To ensure high production, Kean is asking for additional capital of KHR 1,500,000 in order to buy fertilizers and pesticides needed for her rice farm, pay for land fees and hire a few laborers to work on her farm. Although sometimes there are natural calamities that come to destroy her crops, she has the strong determination to ensure high production. She hopes that she will have a fruitful harvest this coming season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides needed for her rice farm, pay for land fees and hire a few laborers to work on her farm.

loans.name: Hamdiya

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. She is 68 years old, married, and has two children who work.

Hamdiya has been a tailor since 1970. She professionally makes, repairs, or alters clothing such as suits, coats, and trousers for women and children. She has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knowledge about their needs. She has a good reputation and she is well known in the surrounding areas.

She is requesting a $3,000 loan to purchase a tailoring machine and an electrical generator. She is aiming to gain more profits to offer her the opportunity to provide a better life for her family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase a tailoring machine and an electrical generator.

loans.name: Aigul

texts.ru:
Айгул 47 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Айгул на протяжении 15 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки дойной коровы. Благодаря упорному труду Айгул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  5 коров, 3 теленка, 30 овец. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айгул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Айгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Aigul is 47 years old, married, and has 4 children. For the past 15 years, Aigul has been raising livestock, having started her business with a purchase of a dairy cow. Thanks to her hard work, Aigul's herd presently has 5 cows, 3 calves, and 30 sheep. In order to develop her business further, Aigul has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy young livestock. She plans to invest her profits from this loan into further livestock purchases.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 35 years-old, married and has three children.

Since 2000, Mohamad has been an owner of a food market selling groceries and chicken.

He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation. His market is situated in a crowded area so there are a lot of customers passing by.

He has applied for a $3,000 loan in order to redecorate his market and to add more foodstuffs. He is aiming to gain more profits in order to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: In order to redecorate his market and to add more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Zohirshoh

texts.ru: Зохиршох добрый и трудолюбивый юноша. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей муки и масло. Он также продает селитру и корм для скота. Зохиршох хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Зохиршох хотел бы получить займ для покупки муки, селитры и корма для скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Zohirshoh is a kind and hard-working young man. For over 5 years, he has been engaged in sales of flour and oil. He also sells nitrate fertilizers and animal feed. Zohirshoh would like to grow his business and earn better profits. He would like to obtain a loan to purchase flour, nitrates, and animal feed in order to expand his operation. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy flour, fertilizers, and animal feed

loans.name: Thary

texts.en: Thary, 42, is married and lives with her husband and four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than twenty years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is employed in the provincial department of information. He earns about USD 5 per day. Two of her children are garment workers. They earn about USD 6 per day. Thary wants to build a new house. Due to lack of funds, Thary is requesting a loan of USD 800 to purchase construction materials to build the house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a house

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a farmer in Kitale area of Western Kenya where she lives with her family of four children ranging in age from 7 to 14.  She has been farming for twelve years and runs her farm with the help of two farmhands. In addition to farming, she also runs a motorcycle transport business.

Irene has made a loan request of 62,400 KES from Kiva Partner Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. This is Irene’s third loan request with Juhudi Kilimo after previously receiving loans of 30,000 KES and 50,000 KES. She plans to buy more land for expansion of her farming business.

She mentions high costs of production, fluctuating market prices and animal diseases as being major farming challenges.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Matondo 4 Group

texts.en:
Blood is a 30-year-old single woman with no children. She represents the Matondo 4 group. She knits clothes, doilies, and other items to sell in a local market.  She has been doing this for the past 5 years, and has become very talented. She will use the loan to buy yarn, string, and other materials needed to knit. Her main problem is the scarcity of the materials she needs. She will buy the materials in bulk with this loan.
Blood has received two previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a good repayment record. She dreams of opening a training school to teach others how to knit and do other crafts. She hopes to continue to take the loans because they help improve her family's life.

loans.use: to pay for yarn and string.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru:
Розе 49 лет, вдова, воспитала 4 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Роза с 1990 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний  день в хозяйстве Розы имеется 1 корова, 8 телок,  и 10 овец. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Роза обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота.  Доходы от кредита Роза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства за счет постройки большого сарая для скота.
