Ehtibor is married and the loving mother of four children.  She has been buying and selling shoes for more than 12 years.  Her husband is a driver. 

Ehtibor acquires merchandise two or three times a week.  Her son helps her with the business.  She has many loyal customers, and this allows her to successfully carry on her business.

In order to expand her business, Ehtibor would like to receive a loan to buy summer shoes.  She is looking forward to your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: to buy summer shoes.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María  de 27 años vive ( playa  Ecuador ). Ella decidió entra a este negocio hace  2 años que es la despensa de víveres   lo hizo actualmente construye locales comerciales  le va bien  aparte vende productos de bazar. Es soltera. A futuro anhela tener su familia bien  y mejorar su negocio. Con el préstamo comprara (víveres  para enlatdos, bebidas, confites).
texts.en: María is 27 years old and she lives in Playas, Ecuador. She sells groceries, an activity she decided to engage in 2 years ago; at the moment she is also engaged in building commercial locales, on top of keeping on selling general goods. She is single, and in the future she hopes to have a family and to improve her activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy products such as canned food, drinks and candies.

loans.use: To buy canned food, drinks and candies.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es: Juan tiene 28 años de edad, es casado y tiene 3 hijos, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y a cuidar los niños y cuando puede también le colabora en los trabajos del campo, es una familia muy trabajadora y honesta. Juan aprendió el negocio de su papa, ya que le regalo una manzana para que cultivara la tierra y poco a poco ha ido creciendo con su finca de cafe, el horario laboral es de 6:00 am a 1:00 pm y cuando es temporada de cosecha trabaja todo el día ya que el trabajo lo amerita. Una de las dificultades que Juan presenta es la falta de mano de obra para realizar el corte y la recolección de café y que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder hacer crecer su finca. El préstamo que Juan solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para mejorar la finca y poder sembrar más café. Una de sus metas es poder tener una mayor producción de café para obtener mayores ganancias y así poder sacar adelante a su familia. Este es el primer financiamiento de Juan en FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Juan is 28 years old, he is married and he has 3 children. His wife takes care of the household chores and looking after the children and when she can she also helps with the farm work. They are a very hardworking and honest family.

Juan learned this business from his dad as he gave him a plot of land to cultivate and his coffee plantation has gradually grown. The working day is from 6.00 am until 1.00 pm and when it is harvesting season he works all day as it is very worthwhile. One of the difficulties that Juan faces is the lack of labor for picking and collecting the coffee beans and he does not have enough money to increase the size of his plantation. 

Juan needs the requested loan to invest in fertilizers to improve his plantation and sow more coffee seeds. One of his goals is to have a greater coffee production in order to make a better profit and therefore get his family ahead in life. This is Juan’s first FAMA loan and he hopes to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Tièssiri Group

texts.fr:
Constitué exclusivement de 6 femmes mariées, les membres de groupe Tièssiri vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso  et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. 
Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, de condiments, chaussures, de charbons de bois et d’encens. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégrés  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 5ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Djeneba (debout à droite sur la photo) est la vendeuse de chaussures du groupe. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 20 douzaines  de chaussures en plastique.
Elle s’approvisionne auprès  des grossistes et effectue ses  ventes en détail, au comptant, à domicile et au marché, à une clientèle mixte. 
Madame Djeneba compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 22.500 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et aider son mari dans  certaines dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
The majority of the six members of the Tièssiri group, who are all married women, live in traditional families and average 42 years of age with four children each. They all live in the town of Sikasso and got to know each other through relatives, neighbors and marriage.

The group members have small trading activities, selling condiments, shoes, charcoal and incense. They joined Soro Yiriwaso with a view to increasing their business volume and are now on their fifth group loan. 

Djeneba (standing on the right of the photo) is the shoe seller in the group. She is planning to use her loan to buy 20 dozen plastic shoes. She gets her supplies from wholesalers and sells them on a retail basis, for cash, from home and in the market, to a diverse customer base. With this loan Djeneba is expecting to make an average monthly rofit of 22,500FCFA, which will be used to reinvest in her business and to help her husband with some of the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Los Girasoles Del Algodonal Group

texts.es:
Vilma tiene 44 años es casada y tiene 5 hijos, fue su hermana quien la alentó a trabajar en la venta de ropa y diversos artículos como zapatillas y zapatos, alguna vez llego a tener un local donde vendía directamente al público, su negocio  iba muy bien pero al no recibir el apoyo de su familia tuvo que dejarlo, después de algún tiempo nuevamente empezó el mismo negocio pero de diferente manera ofreciendo sus productos de casa en casa, sus clientes son en su mayoría amistades, familiares y personas que la conocen. Con su préstamo comprara ropa y calzado aprovechando que se avecina el día de las madres y las ventas aumentan, su trabajo es de mucha ayuda para colaborar en el sustento de su familia, sobretodo apoyar  a sus hijos en los estudios, espera en un futuro cercano volver a tener su propio bazar; donde pueda exhibir sus productos para así obtener más ingresos, el grupo al cual pertenece  se llama “LOS GIRASOLES DEL ALGODONAL” está conformado por 10 socias.

* La Sra. Vilma esta de cuclillas viste chompa.
texts.en:
Vilma is 44 years old, she is married and she has 5 children. It was her sister who encouraged her to work selling clothes and other items such as slippers and shoes. At one time she managed to have a premises where she sold directly to the public. Her business was going very well but due to a lack of support from her family she had to give it up. After a while she started up the same business again but in a different way. She sold her products from house to house and her customers are mainly her friends, family and acquaintances. With her loan she will buy clothes and footwear, taking advantage of the fact that Mothers’ Day is coming up and sales will rise. Her job is a great contributor to the maintenance of her family, especially in supporting her children in their education. She hopes that in near future she will have her own store once again, where she can display her products and therefore earn a better income. The group to which she belongs is called “LOS GIRASOLES DEL ALGODONAL” [The Cotton Field Sunflowers] and it is made up of ten members.

*Señora Vilma is the lady crouching down wearing a sweater.

loans.use: to buy clothes and footwear

loans.name: Marilu Amparito

texts.es: Marilú   de  38 años vive (guasmo  Guayaquil). Ella decidió entrar a este negocio porque es una buena manera de tener dinero para poder darle lo necesario a sus hijos ya que su esposo la abandono. Este negocio  que es el de tener venta de ropa y aparte  vende cosméticos   le gusta y le va bien gracias a Dios . Trabaja todos los días sola. la dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia  . a futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y sacar adelante a sus hijos . con el préstamo comprara (ropa cosméticos    )
texts.en: Marilú is 38 years old and she lives in Guasmo in Guayaquil. She decided to work in this business because it is a good way to earn money to provide for her children, since her husband abandoned them. This business involves selling clothes and also cosmetics. She enjoys it and it is going well for her, thank God. She works alone every day. The difficulty that she faces is crime. Her greatest wish for the future is for her business to grow and to get her children ahead in life. She will buy clothes and cosmetics with the loan.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and clothes

loans.name: Benita Victoria

texts.es: Benita de 42 años vive (paraíso Guayaquil). Ella empezó este negocio haciendo un curso de costura. Cuando tenía 20 años vio que para poner en práctica su oficio debería tener maquinas así que fue comprando poco a poco sus maquinas. En la actualidad tiene 8 maquinas y 3 trabajadoras. Ella trabaja de lunes a sábado es madre soltera tiene hijos mayores. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia . A futuro anhela mejorar su negocio y terminar su casa . Con el préstamo comprara (telas hilos).
texts.en: Benita, 42, lives in Paraíso, Guayaquil.  She started her business after taking a sewing course.  When she was 20 years old she noticed that in order to be a seamstress she had to have sewing machines so she started buying them little by little.  Now she has eight machines and three employees.  She works Monday through Saturday and is a single mother with adult children.  The difficulty she has is with delinquency.  In the future she wants to improve her business and finish her house.  She will use the loan to buy fabric and thread.

loans.use: To buy thread.

loans.name: Mirella Del Rocio

texts.es: Mireya de 40 años vive (Quevedo ecuador) . Ella desde muy joven aprendió el negocio porque trabajaba en un almacén de ropa por ese motivo decidió independizase y trabajar para ella. Trabaja todos los días recorriendo las calles de Guayaquil este negocio le gusta le da dinero para poder sustentar a su familia. La dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia. A futuro anhela tener su negocio grande y darles todo a sus hijos. Con el préstamo comprara (sabanas ropa).
texts.en: Mirella, 40, lives in Quevedo, Ecuador.  When she was very young she worked for a clothing store and then decided to become independent and work for herself.  Every day she goes out as a street vendor in Guayaquil.  She enjoys her job because it gives her enough income to support her family.  She has some difficulty with delinquency.  In the future she would like to expand her business and give her children everything she can.  The loan will be used to buy sheets and clothing.

loans.use: To buy sheets and clothing.

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Lima Group

texts.es:
Son cerca de 03 años que la Sra. Felicita se dedica a la venta de pollo. Ella tiene un puesto de venta en el mercado Jazmines de Naranjal, anteriormente había alquilado un local para poner un restaurante  pero este fracaso debido a los costos de alquiler y fue cerrado, mucho tiempo después una amiga  la animo a dedicarse a la venta de pollo, al principio no le fue muy bien porque muchas veces se quedaba con su producto, pero con perseverancia siguió adelante; en la actualidad con el fruto de su trabajo pudo comprar su propio puesto en el mercado, sus ingresos han mejorado  permitiéndole ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, lo que más desea en adelante es comprarse su casa propia ya que por hora vive de alquiler, el préstamo que ha solicitado le servirá para la compra pollos y huevos, con esto surtirá su negocio. La Sra. felicita es parte del grupo “SANTA ROSA DE LIMA”. 

•	La Sra. Felicita es la 3ra de la derecha viste polo turquesa.
texts.en:
Señora Felicita has been selling chicken for a living for almost 3 years. She has a stall in the Jazmines de Naranjal market. She had previously rented a premises where she had a restaurant but this failed due to the cost of rent and it closed down. Some time later a friend encouraged her to sell chicken. At first it didn’t go very well as she was often left with her product but with much perseverance she succeeded. The fruits of her labor have now allowed her to buy her own stall in the market. Her income has improved and she is able to help her husband with the household expenses. What she wants most for the future is to buy her own home as she is currently renting. The loan which she has requested will be used to buy chickens and eggs and this will stock her business. Señora Felicita is part of the “SANTA ROSA DE LIMA” group.

*Señora Felicita is 3rd from the right, wearing a turquoise shirt.

loans.use: to buy chickens and eggs

loans.name: Jessica Claribel

texts.es: Jessica tiene 24 años de edad, es casada y no tiene hijos, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, ellos residen en la comunidad de patuca, departamento de Olancho. Ella inicio su negocio porque su padre le regalo una parcela de tierra para que empezara con el cultivo de café, poco a poco ha ido comprando manzanas de tierra  para cultivarla por lo que ahora cuenta  con una finca mas extensa, desde hace 5 años se dedica a la siembra de café, trabaja en conjunto con su esposo, su horario de trabajo es variable, en algunas ocasiones es todo el día y en otras solo la mitad del día. Las únicas dificultades que presenta es que los compradores le pagan el producto al precio que ellos dicen y esto les afecta en su economía, también que en temporada de cosecha la mano de obra es escasa y casi no se hayan trabajadores para el corte de café y se pierde gran parte de la cosecha. El préstamo que solicita lo necesita para la compra de fertilizantes para el mejoramiento de la finca. La meta de Jessica es poder tener un negocio bien constituido para poder exportar el grano al interior del país. Es el primer financiamiento en FAMA y espera pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en: Jessica is 24 years old, she is married and she doesn’t have any children. Her husband works in agriculture. They live in the community of Patuca in the department of Olancho. She began her business because her father gave her a plot of land so that she could start to cultivate coffee beans and she has gradually bought more plots of land to farm on and she now has a more extensive plantation. For the past 5 years she has been sowing coffee. She works with her husband. Her working hours vary, sometimes she works all day and other times she only works half days. The only difficulties she faces are that the buyers only pay what they want to for the product and this affects her finances. Also during harvesting season labor is limited and there are almost no workers to pick the coffee so they lose a large part of their harvest. The requested loan is needed for the purchase of fertilizers to improve the plantation. Jessica’s goal is to have an established business so that she can export the beans to the interior of the country. It is her first FAMA loan and she hopes to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Paz Y Amor Group

texts.es: Don José tiene 55 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Paz y Amor, es casado y tiene 6 hijos, su esposa es comerciante y ellos residen en la comunidad del bijao, municipio de Juticalpa, Olancho. Don José desde hace 2 años se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos, lo atiende el y su esposa, el horario de trabajo es desde las 8:00 am hasta las 8:00 pm, la ventaja de don José es que le ha ido muy bien en el negocio ya que le ha resultado factible, las ganancias que obtiene le da para pagar sus obligaciones y al sostenimiento de su familia. Una de las dificultades que se le presenta es que no hay energía eléctrica en la comunidad y necesita un frízer para congelar sus lácteos. El préstamo que don José solicita lo necesita para mejorar su vivienda siendo que desea ponerle piso de cerámica a su casa. Con el apoyo de este préstamo don José podrá tener un mejor nivel de vida ya que su casa tiene piso de tierra y ya no levantara polvo y por ende su salud mejorara. Una de las metas es tener mayor surtido su negocio y que el local se mas grande. Este es el segundo financiamiento que solicita en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
José, 55, is a member of the communal bank "Paz y Amor".  He is married and has six children.  His wife is a merchant and they live in the community of Bijao, municipality of Juticalpa, Olancho.  For two years José has been in the dairy products business.  He and his wife work from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.  The advantage José has is that business has gone so well that he has made enough profit to pay off debts and support his family.

One of the difficulties he runs into is that there is no electricity in the community and he needs a freezer for the dairy products.  The loan requested by José is to renovate his house by putting in a ceramic tile floor.  With the help of the loan José will be able to improve his lifestyle since his house currently has a dirt floor so a new tile floor will improve hygiene.  One of his goals for the business is to have a wider range of products and a larger shop.  This is his second loan through FAMA, and he paid off his previous loan on time.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Exekennedy

texts.es: Exekennedy tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y reside en la comunidad de patuca, Olancho.  El se dedica al cultivo y venta de café, negocio que aprendió de su padre, inicio desde que estaba muy pequeño trabajando en la finca de su papa. Desde hace 8 años comenzó  a cultivar su propia finca, su horario laboral es de 6:00 am a 1:00 pm y en temporada de cosecha de café trabaja a tiempo completo ya que el trabajo es muy abundante. En cuanto a las ventajas es que el negocio es muy rentable y le deja buenas ganancias, el único inconveniente es que solamente la cosecha de café se da una vez al año. Con el préstamo que Exekennedy esta solicitando lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para mejorar la finca y poder tener mayor producción de café. El único problema con el cultivo de café es en el invierno que por la continua lluvia se cae el grano y por la tanto es una perdida. La meta de Exekennedy es poder tener una finca más extensa y que la producción de café sea de calidad.  Este es su primer préstamo en FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Exekennedy is 27 years old, single and lives in the community of Patuca, Olancho. He makes a living growing and selling coffee, which he learned from his father working at a very early age on a farm.

8 years ago he began to cultivate his own farm, his working hours are from 6:00 am to 1:00 pm but during the harvest season he works full time as the work is very abundant.

In terms of advantages, the business is very profitable and provides him a good with a good profit; the only downside is that there is only one harvest a year. Exekennedy is requesting the loan to buy fertilizer to improve the farm and increase the production of coffee

The main challenge with the cultivation of coffee is during the winter when, because of the continuous rain, the grain falls down and therefore there is a loss. Exekennedy’s goal is to have a more extensive farm and to produce better quality coffee.

This is his first loan in FAMA and he hopes to make the payments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Mujeres Buscando Un Futuro Group

texts.es:
El grupo “MUJERES BUSCANDO UN FUTURO” es una de las alcancías con la mayor cantidad de socias, son 17   integrantes que la conforman; una de ellas el Liceth una joven de 18 años que se dedica al anfitrionaje y también a la venta de productos de belleza, fue por medio de  una amiga quien la animo  a vender para tener ingresos adicionales, durante estos 7 meses que lo hace ha podido ganar muchos clientes entre los que cuenta a sus amigas y familiares quiénes son sus mayores compradores, el dinero de su préstamo  lo usara para seguir basteciendo su negocio con  productos como perfumes, lociones, cremas y cosméticos. Así puede cumplir  con sus pedidos de sus clientas, ella está ahorrando para comprarse una laptop que le servirá para sus estudios y lo que más quisiera en el futuro es tener su propio spa donde pueda ofrecer todo tipo de servicios de belleza.

*Liceth es la 5ta de las paradas (la parte de atrás) viste polo azulino.
texts.en:
The communal bank "MUJERES BUSCANDO UN FUTURO" is one of the largest groups and has 17 members.  One of them, Liceth, is 18 and works as a hostess selling beauty products.  A friend of hers encouraged her to start selling to make extra income.  In the seven months since she started she has acquired many customers among her friends and relatives, who are her largest buyers.  She plans to use the loan to continue stocking products such as perfumes, lotions, creams and cosmetics.  This will enable her to fill customers' orders.  She is saving to buy a laptop for her studies; but what she aspires to most in the future is to have her own spa so she can offer all kinds of beauty services.

*Liceth is standing in the back row, fifth over, in a blue top.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, lotions, creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: El Algodonal Florece Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Lucila siempre buscado la manera de ayudar  su esposo con los gastos de la casa,  desde  que sus  3 hijos eran pequeños realizo diversos trabajos, en la actualidad se dedica a la venta de alimentos; sobre todo los fines de semana  que prepara tamales y chicharrones ya es conocida por su buena sazón, es así que sus vecinos acuden a consumir, por las noches también vende anticuchos en la puerta de su casa donde  a acondicionado algunas mesitas y sillas. La Sra. Lucila espera tener un lugar más grande y cómodo para atender a sus clientes para eso está ahorrando, su negocio es conocido como la anticucheria “ ANTOJITOS” el dinero de su préstamo le va a servir para comprarse un andamio para colocar sus gaseosas y otras bebidas, gracias a su trabajo puede solventar algunos gastos familiares como pagos de servicios y alimentación.

•	La Sra Lucila esta vestida con polo azulino es la primera de la fila (sentadas).
texts.en:
Lucila is always looking for ways to help her husband with the household expenses.  Ever since her three children were little she has had several jobs; but now she sells food, especially on weekends when she makes tamales and pork cracklings.  She is well known for her delicious cuisine so many neighbors buy from her.  At night she also sells snack foods outside her house where she has set up tables and chairs.  Lucila wants to have a larger and more comfortable place for her customers, and so she is saving to that end.  Her snack bar is called "ANTOJITOS".  She plans to use the loan to buy shelving for sodas and other beverages.  Thanks to her work she is able to pay for family expenses, such as food and services.

*   Lucila is the first on the left in a blue top.

loans.use: To buy shelving.

loans.name: Luis Ramon

texts.es: Luis tiene 42 años de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, es una familia muy unida y tratan de luchar juntos para salir adelante. Luis desde hace 15 años se dedica al cultivo de café, oficio que aprendió de su padre desde que era un niño, su papa le regalo una manzana de tierra para que empezara a cultivarla y fue así como poco a poco ha podido salir adelante con su finca, sus dos hijos mayores son los que le ayudan a cuidar la finca, el horario de trabajo es de 7:00 am hasta las 3:00 pm y cuando es tiempo de cosecha el horario es a tiempo completo debido a la abundancia de trabajo. Los problemas que presenta Juan es que cuando es tiempo de lluvia la cosecha no rinde porque el grano de café se cae, también que por la falta de dinero no pueden cosechar y hacer crecer su finca. El préstamo que solicita Juan lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo.  Una de sus metas es poder convertirse en un gran productor de café para lograr sacar adelante a su familia. Este es el primer financiamiento que solicita en FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en: Luis, 42, is married and has four children.  His wife is a homemaker and the family is very united and strives to work together to get ahead.  For 15 years Luis has been growing coffee, a trade he learned from his father when he was just a child.  His father gave him a patch of land to cultivate, so little by little he has been able to make progress on his farm.  His two eldest sons are the ones who help him on the farm.  The work hours are from 7:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., and during harvest season the schedule runs a full day because of all the work.  The challenge Juan runs into is when it rains because the coffee beans drop off.  Also the lack of money means he cannot harvest and expand his farm.  The loan Juan is requesting is to buy fertilizer for his crop.  One of his goals to become a large coffee producer so his family can get ahead.  This is his first loan through FAMA and he is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es:
Rodrigo siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y gracias a esta cualidad ha logrado salir adelante junto con su familia brindándoles una buena calidad de vida. Desde los 11 años de edad aprendió trabajando al lado de su padre la producción de cultivos, y durante toda su vida se ha dedicado a esta actividad. Gracias a toda la experiencia que ha adquirido, Rodrigo es reconocido por tener cultivos de muy buena calidad y esto lo ha diferenciado con sus clientes. Desde hace aproximadamente 7 años decidió montar su propio negocio y con uno ahorros que tenía sacó su primer cultivo de frutas, y desde este momento viene trabajando de manera independiente y así genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Debido a la fuerte temporada invernal, sus cultivos se han deteriorado bastante, por esto busca que un préstamo le permita comprar abonos, riegos, insecticidas y fungicidas para poder sacar su cultivo adelante. 

De esta manera su negocio seguirá saliendo adelante y así podrá seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, brindándole a su familia una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Rodrigo has always been known as a very hard-working man and, thanks to this quality, he has managed to make progress together with his family, offering them a good quality of life.  He started learning how to grow crops at the age of 11, working alongside his father.  He has been in this line of work his entire life.  Thanks to all of the experience he has gained, Rodrigo is well known for producing very good quality crops and this has set him apart from the rest in his customers' eyes.

Seven years ago, Rodrigo decided to set up his own business and he used some savings that he had to grow his first lot of fruit.  From that time on, he has been working independently and making the income he needs to provide for his household (his wife and four children).  His crops have suffered quite a lot as a result of the harsh winter season and so he is looking for a loan that will allow him to buy fertilizers, irrigation equipment, insecticides and fungicides.

In this way, Rodrigo's business will continue moving forward and he will be able to continue making the income he needs to cover his household expenses, providing his family with a good quality of life and better opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, irrigation equipment, insecticides and fungicides

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Pedro tiene 64 años de edad, es divorciado y tiene un hijo de crianza. Desde muy pequeño él ha trabajado en la agricultura y en la ganadería en pequeña escala. Don pedro siembra sus cultivos de maíz para tener el resto del año. 

Los abonos y los químicos los compra en una ciudad que esta a treinta minutos de su casa y viaja los días sábados por la mañana. 

Don Pedro solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 4 sacos de abono que cuestan unos $300 dólares, herbicidas,  pago de mano de obra que le ayude en la preparación del terreno para sembrar el maíz. Con el préstamo él comprara los insumos necesarios para sembrar el cultivo de maíz y poder obtener una buena cosecha para vender una parte ya que le es rentable, mejorando su calidad de vida, para proporcionarle  mejores condiciones a su hijo.

El deseo de don Pedro es ayudarle a su hijo para que estudie. Además quiere mejorar su vivienda y vender su cosecha a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Pedro, 64, is divorced and has a son.  Ever since he was very young he has worked in agriculture and small scale livestock farming.  Pedro grows corn so he will have it throughout the year.

He buys fertilizer and chemicals in the city, which is 30 minutes from his house, and he travels there Saturday morning.

Pedro is requesting a loan through Fundación Campo, to buy four sacks of fertilizer that cost $300, herbicides, and hire help to prepare the land to plant corn.  He will use the loan to buy the necessary supplies for his corn crop so he can have a profitable harvest, improve his lifestyle and give his son better conditions.

Pedro's goal is to help his son get an education.  He also wants to renovate his house and sell his harvested crop at a better price.

loans.use: To buy four sacks of fertilizer and herbicides, and hire help to prepare the land to plant corn.

loans.name: Santos Raymundo

texts.es: Don Raymundo tiene 55 años de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y cuando puede le ayuda a su esposo en los trabajos del campo. Es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora. El se dedica a la siembra y al cultivo de café, oficio que lo aprendió de su padre, don Raymundo inicio cultivando una manzana de tierra a lo que hoy ha logrado tener su finca, su horario de trabajo es a tiempo completo ya que es su única fuente de ingreso. El negocio del cultivo de café  en ciertas temporadas resulta ser muy rentable para don Raymundo ya que cuenta con buenos clientes y le dan un buen precio por el café. El solicita este préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes, ya que lo necesita para el mejoramiento de la finca. El préstamo le ayudaría en gran manera ya que tendrá una fuente de ingreso seguro y a un interés bajo por lo que le dejara mayores ganancias en su cosecha. El problema que enfrenta don Raymundo ha sido la parte económica que han tenido que descuidar la finca por falta de dinero. El mayor deseo de don Raymundo es mejorar la instalación física de su finca para aumentar sus ganancias y así mejorar la economía de su hogar. Este es su primer préstamo en FAMA y espera cumplir puntualmente con el compromiso de sus pagos.
texts.en: Raymundo is 55 years old, married, and has four children.  His wife takes care of their home and, when she is able, she helps her husband with his farming work.  Raymundo is a tenacious and hard-working person.  His business is growing coffee, a trade that he learned from his father.  He started out growing on one 'manzana' (1.68 acres) of land where he now has his plantation.  He works full time as this is his only source of income.  During certain seasons, the coffee growing business is very profitable for Raymundo as he has good customers who give him a good price for his coffee.  He is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers which he needs in order to improve his coffee crops.  The loan would help him a lot as it would give him a guaranteed source of income and a low interest rate which will mean more profits for him when he harvests his crops.  The problems that Raymundo has faced have been financial.  He has had to neglect his farm for lack of money.  His biggest wish is to improve the physical installation of his farm so that he can increase his profits and thereby improve his household economy.  This is his first loan from FAMA and he hopes to make his loan repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Clementino

texts.es: Don Clementino tiene 51 años de edad, es casado y tiene 6 hijos, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, ellos residen en la comunidad de Patuca, Olancho. El se dedica desde hace 20 años a la siembra de café, comenzó su negocio por iniciativa propia ya que el oficio lo aprendió cuando salía a trabajar en las temporadas de café y vio que era rentable por lo que decidió cultivar su finca, por lo general su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am hasta las 4:00 pm, pero cuando es tiempo de cosecha no tiene horario ya que el trabajo es muy abundante y tiene que aprovechar el tiempo para hacer la recolecta de café. Uno de los problemas que tiene que enfrentar es el cambio de clima, ya que a veces llueve mucho y pierde bastante cultivo. El préstamo que don Clementino solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para el mejoramiento de  la finca de café, con la ayuda de este préstamo podrá aumentar su producción y por ende sus ganancias. Una de sus metas es hacer crecer su finca, que este mejor tecnificada para que pueda obtener mayores ingresos los cuales le ayuden al sostenimiento de su familia. Este es el primer financiamiento con FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Clementino, 51, is married and has six children.  His wife is a homemaker and they live in the community of Patuca, Olancho.  For 20 years he has been growing coffee.  He started the business on his own initiative since he learned the trade by going out to work during coffee season; and upon seeing how profitable it was decided to cultivate his own land.  In general his work schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., but at harvest time this varies as work is abundant and he must take advantage of the time to harvest the coffee.  One of the problems he is up against is the changing climate, because when it rains a lot he loses much of his crop.  

The loan being requested by Clementino is to buy fertilizers to improve his coffee plantation.  The loan will help him increase production and income.  One of his goals is to expand the farm and improve technical aspects to increase his income and better support the family.  This is his first loan through FAMA and he is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Santos Melania

texts.es: Santos Melania tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, es una familia muy responsable y luchadora. Ella se dedica a trabajar en el campo, su negocio es el cultivo de café, lo aprendió muy joven cuando salía a trabajar a las fincas de los vecinos, con su esposo empezó a ahorrar para poder comprar una parcela de tierra para cultivarla, poco a poco  y con mucho sacrificio ha hecho crecer su finca, ella trabaja en conjunto con su esposo y tres de sus hijos, se dedican por completo a esta labor ya que es la única fuente de ingreso que tienen. El préstamo lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para la finca, seria una muy buena oportunidad ya que de lo contrario tendría que comprometer la cosecha con intermediarios que se aprovechan a comprar el producto a un bajo precio. El único inconveniente que se le presenta es la falta de mano de obra para hacer la recolección del café, ya que la mayoría tiene su finca y es difícil encontrar suficiente gente que ayude en la temporada de cosecha. Uno de sus sueños es mejorar la finca para tener una mejor producción de café y lograr salir adelante con su familia. Este es el primer financiamiento que obtiene doña Melania en FAMA y espera cumplir puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en: Santos Melania is 32 years old. She is married and has 5 children. Her husband is a farmer. They are a responsible family and they are fighters. She works in the fields and her business is growing coffee. She learned this very young when she would go and work on her neighbors' farms. With her husband, she started to save to buy a parcel of land to cultivate. Little by little and with a lot of sacrifice, she has made her farm grow. She works with her husband and three of her children. They are totally dedicated to this work since it is their only source of income. She needs the loan to invest in buying fertilizer for the farm. It would be a good opportunity, since if she doesn't take it out she will have to compromise her crop with intermediaries who take advantage to buy the product at a low price. The only problem she faces is the lack of labor to pick the coffee, since most people have their own farms and it is difficult to find enough people to help at harvest time. One of her dreams is to improve the farm to have better coffee production and get ahead with her family. This is the first loan Melania has taken out with FAMA and she hopes to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Ana Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora. Ana es socia del banco comunal Estrellitas, vive por las afueras de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad de clima frió, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos y cuenta con una gran belleza natural, su gente es de un corazón muy cálido, amable, gentil y cordial, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Ana tiene 46 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 27, 20 y 11 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, su segundo hijo trabaja para sus gastos personales y su último hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión fotógrafo, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Ana nos comenta que en su salud se encuentra delicada ya que sufre de dolores de cabeza constantes pero su familia se encuentra gozando de muy buena salud por lo que agradece a Dios.

Nuestras socia desde hace 5 años se dedica a la venta ambulante de limpiones de cocina actividad que ha iniciado viéndose en la necesidad de aportar a la economía de su hogar y sacar en adelante a sus hijos.
 
El dinero de su crédito anterior lo ha invertido comprando limpiones, y su nuevo crédito es para la compra de mas limpiones de cocina para seguir creciendo en el negocio, le va bien en su negocio existiendo días buenos y malos pero no ha tenido dificultad alguna para el pago de las cuotas de su crédito. La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo del grupo y los créditos le permiten incrementar mercadería para sus negocios.

Su sueño es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Ana is a member of the Estrellitas community bank.  She lives on the outskirts of the city of Cuenca, a cold-climate city which, in December 1999, was named a World Heritage Site.  It is surrounded by four rivers and has great natural beauty.  The local people are very warm-hearted, kind, cordial and friendly.  They maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Ana is 46 years old, married, and has three children who are 27, 20 and 11 years old.  Her eldest daughter is married and lives independently.  Her second child (a son) works in order to cover his personal expenses and her youngest [son] attends school in the city.  Her husband is a photographer by profession.  They do not own their own home but live in rental accommodation.

Our member has been selling dishcloths as an itinerant vendor for five years.  She started out in this business as she saw that she needed to contribute financially to her household and get her children ahead in life.

Ana invested the money from her previous loan in buying dishcloths.  She will use her new loan to buy more dishcloths so that she can continue growing in her business.  Her business is doing well.  She has good days and bad days but hasn't experienced any difficulties in making her monthly loan repayments.  She likes her community bank because of the friendship that exists within the group and because the loans allow them to increase their business merchandise.

Ana's dream is to own her own home.

loans.use: to buy dishcloths

loans.name: Mayra Ximena

texts.es:
La Señora Mayra es socia del banco Estrellitas, vive por las afueras de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad de clima frió, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos y cuenta con una gran belleza natural, su gente es de un corazón muy cálido, amable, gentil y cordial, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Mayra es casada, su esposo es empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

La Señora Mayra se encuentra gozando de muy buena salud al igual que están todos los miembros que conforman su familia. Nuestra socia labora como empleada privada y también labora conjuntamente con su mamá en la fabricación de delantales, esta actividad la desempeña desde hace 4 años, se dedica a esta actividad porque es un trabajo rentable. 

El dinero de su crédito anterior lo ha invertido comprando tela, hilos, botones, etc. y su nuevo crédito va a  invertir en la compra de tela e hilo para continuar creciendo en el negocio,  el pago de su crédito anterior no ha tenido ninguna dificultad. La banca comunal le gusta el apoyo que tiene del grupo ya que son muy unidos.

Su meta es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Mayra is a member of Estrellitas bank. She lives outside the city of Cuenca, a city with a cool climate. It was declared a World Heritage Site in December 1999. It is bathed by 4 rivers and great natural beauty. Its people are warmhearted, friendly, kind and cordial. They maintain their culture and traditions. 

Mayra is married and her husband works in a private business. They do no own their own home and are renters.  

Mayra is in good health and so are all of her family members. She works as a private employee and also works with her mother making aprons. She has done this activity for 4 years and does it because it is a profitable activity.    

She has invested the money from the previous loan in buying fabric, thread, buttons, etc. She will invest the new loan in buying fabric and thread to continue growing in the business. She paid off the previous loan without any difficulty. She likes the communal bank because of the group support, as they are very close. 

Her goal is to own her own house.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: La Propuesta  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal La Propuesta está formada por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes en su mayor parte viven por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió,  sus grandes llanuras son propicias para la ganadería, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades. Nuestras socias se caracterizan por mantener la llama encendida de su cultura y tradiciones, son amables, gentiles y muy trabajadoras ya que con su esfuerzo mejoran la economía de sus hogares para adelante con sus familias.

Una de las socias es la Señora. Maida, este es su primer crédito que realiza en la banca comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga. Tiene 25 años, vive en unión libre y fruto de su unión ha concebido una niña de un mes y medio. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y presta su servicio con un taxi, la casa en la que vive es arrendada.

La Señora. Maida se dedica a su hogar y en la casa de su mamá se dedica a la cría de cerdos, cuyes y pollos a los que los vende a sus conocidas y amigas. 

Nuestra socia su primer crédito lo va a invertir comprando pollos y el alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es construir su casa propia.
texts.en:
'La Propuesta' community bank is made up of seven women and one man, most of whom live in Tarqui parish, in Cuenca.  This is a cold-climate area with vast plains which are ideal for livestock raising.  The local people raise livestock and farm.   Many also work in different business activities in the city.  Our members are noted for keeping the flame of their culture and traditions alive.  They are kind and very hard working.  Through their efforts, they improve their households' finances so that they can get ahead in life together with their families.

One of the members is Maida.  This is the first loan that she has taken out through the community bank, which she was invited to join by a friend.  She is 25 years old and lives with her common-law husband.  The couple have a daughter who is one and a half months old.  Maida's husband is a driver and provides a taxi service.  They live in a rental house.

Maida looks after her house and, at her mom's house, she raises pigs, guinea pigs and chickens which she sells to her friends and acquaintances.  She will invest her first loan in buying chickens and feed for her animals.  Her goal is to build her own home.

loans.use: to buy chickens and animal feed

loans.name: Mujeres De Esperanza  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mujeres de Esperanza está formado por 8 socias quienes son conocidas y tiene una gran amistad, laboran en diferentes actividades económicas las mismas que les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y salir adelante con sus familias. Nuestras socias se caracterizan por su carisma, su alegría y por su cultura y tradiciones que aun la mantienen. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera de mayor importancia económica del país, desde 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, esta bañada por 4 ríos, su gastronomía es muy variada y cautiva el paladar de propios y visitantes.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Orfelinda, tiene 40 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 23, 18, 17, 15, 13, 10 años de edad, su primera hija trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, su segunda hija es casada y vive independiente,  tres de sus hijos estudian en el colegio y su ultimo hijo está en una escuelita de la ciudad.
 
Doña María Orfelinda se dedica a realizar las tareas de su hogar y a tejer blusas y bufandas, actividad que aprendió desde hace 23 años de su madre, también desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de varias marcas.
 
Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir comprado hilo para sus tejidos y cosméticos para ofrecer a su clientela una mayor variedad.
 
Sus sueños son tener su casa propia y que sus hijos lleguen a ser unos buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The Mujeres de Esperanza [Women of Hope] communal bank is made up of 8 members who know each other and have a great friendship. They work at different economic activities that allow them to pay their household expenses and get ahead with their families. These members are characterized by their charisma, their cheerfulness, and their culture and traditions. They live in different parts of the the city o Cuenca. This city is the third most economically important in the country. It has been a World Heritage Site since 1999. It is bathed in 4 rivers and has a varied cuisine that captures that palate of its own people and visitors.   

One of the members of the group is María Orfelinda. She is 40 years old and has had six children in her marriage, aged  23, 18, 17, 15, 13, and 10 years old. Her oldest daughter works and helps her financially. Her second oldest daughter is married and lives on her own. Three of her children go to high school and her youngest son is in a primary school in town.  
 
María Orfelinda works taking care of her household and weaving blouses and scarves. She learned this activity when she was 23 years old from her mother. For 3 years, she has also sold various brands of cosmetics.   
 
This is the first loan she has had with the communal bank and she is going to invest it in buying thread for her weaving and in cosmetics to offer her customers a greater variety.
 
Her dream is to own her own house and for her children to become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy thread and cosmetics.

loans.name: Madres Ladereñas Group

texts.es:
Ya son 08 años que la Sra. Betty se dedica al tejido artesanal. Ella recuerda que fue una vecina quien le enseño a tejer, poco a  poco  fue perfeccionando su trabajo hasta lograr aprender. ella con un grupo de vecinas trabajan prestando servicio de tejido a varias empresas exportadoras, pero Betty  por cuenta propia realiza tejidos como chompas, ponchos, gorras y chalinas; los que ofrece a sus vecinos y amigos, la temporada de invierno es muy buena para ella porque tiene muchos pedidos,  su préstamo le sirve para la compra de sus materiales como hilos y lanas al por mayor, así aminora costos y obtiene mejores ganancias, por su lado ella siempre está pendiente de sacar nuevos modelos para eso se capacita llevando cursos, con su trabajo ha podido darle a su hija estudios en un buen colegio, para más adelante quiere abrir un taller donde pueda seguir trabajando y exhibir sus productos al público. Ella es parte del grupo “MADRES LADEREÑAS”  que está formado por vecinas del mismo lugar.

*La Sra. Betty es la 2da (sentada) viste blusa a cuadros.
texts.en:
Betty has been knitting products by hand for eight years.  She recalls that it was a neighbor who taught her to knit.  She gradually learned and perfected her skills.  She and a group of neighbors provide a knitting service to several companies who export their products.  However, Betty herself also knits items such as sweaters, ponchos, hats and scarves which she sells to friends and neighbors.  The winter season is very good for her because she has a lot of orders.  She will use her loan to buy materials such as yarn and threads wholesale.  This will reduce her costs and she will make better profits.  Betty is always ready to make new designs and so she trains by taking courses.  Through her work, she has been able to provide her daughter with an education at a good school.  In the future, she would like to open a workshop where she can continue working and display her products to the public.  She is a member of the 'Madres Ladereñas' group which is made up of neighbors.  

* Betty is sitting down, second from the left, wearing a checkered blouse.

loans.use: to buy yarn and threads

loans.name: Corazón De Jesus Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Irene tiene 40 años, sus 03 hijos son el mejor motivo para que ella continúe  trabajando siempre se ha dedicado a la preparación y venta de alimentos antes vendía chicharrones pero lo dejo por que la venta era muy baja, motivada por su hermana empezó con la venta de ceviche un plato mas popular que le dejaba mejores ganancias, este trabajo lo realiza por las mañanas y por las noches vende de anticuchos que también es requerido por las personas que acuden a su negocio, la zona donde está ubicada es muy buena debido a las fabricas que existen en el lugar  con su trabajo ayuda a su hija en los estudios, lo que más desea es verla convertida en una  profesional y su máximo sueño por alcanzar es tener un local propio para poner su restaurante, el préstamo obtenido  le servirá para la compra de mesas, bancas y algunas  ollas de esa manera  atender mejor  sus clientes. Irene es parte del grupo “CORAZON DE JESUS” formado en la zona de los Olivos Lima Perú.
*Irene es la 5ta (parada) viste polo negro.
texts.en:
Irene is 40 years old.  Her three children are her best motivation to keep working.  She has always worked preparing and selling food.  In the past, she used to sell 'chicharrones' but she stopped because her sales were very low.  Encouraged by her sister, she started selling 'ceviche' (fish marinated in citrus juice).  This is a more popular dish and it has made her better profits.  She carries out this work in the mornings and in the evenings she sells kebabs which are also in demand with the people who come to her business.  The area in which her business is located is a very good one because of the surrounding factories.  Through her work, Irene helps her daughter with her education.  What she would most like is to see her daughter become a professional.  Her biggest dream is to own her own premises in which to set up her restaurant.  Irene will use her loan to buy tables, benches and some pans.  This will allow her to better serve her customers.  

Irene is a member of the 'Corazón de Jesús' group which is located in Los Olivos neighborhood, in Lima, Peru.

*Irene is the fifth person from the left.  She is stood up and wearing a black top.

loans.use: to buy tables, benches and pans

loans.name: La Cruz De Yerbateros Group

texts.es:
Personas empeñosas por salir adelante, de esta manera se denominan las integrantes del grupo  la Cruz de Yerbateros , grupo conformado por 7 socias que entre el hogar y sus familias ven la forma de llevar ingresos económicos a sus hogares por medio de sus negocios.
Tal así es el caso de la señora Flor de María de 41 años de edad casada y con 2 hijos que dependen de ella. Hace más de 7 años se dedica a la venta de helados en el verano y en el invierno a la venta de Emoliente el cual es una bebida de la zona, esto lo hace con el mejor de los esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante cada día por el bien de ella y su familia y en el futuro le gustaría tener una heladería mucho mas equipada. Con el reciente préstamo ella implementará su mercadería, comprando productos para la temporada de invierno. Como la señora flor De María el resto de los integrantes tienen una historia en particular pero, todos coinciden en el esfuerzo y dedicación que brindan todos los días por el bien de sus familias.
texts.en:
'People who are keen to make progress' is how the members of the 'Cruz de Yerbateros' group describe themselves.  This group has seven [female] members who find a way to make income for their households and families through their businesses.

This is the case of 41-year-old Flor de María who is married and has two dependent children.  For more than seven years, she has been selling iced treats in the summer and 'emoliente' (a local drink) in the winter.  She works as hard as she is able in order to get ahead in life for the good of herself and her family.  In the future, she would like to have a much better equipped ice cream parlor.  She will use her loan to stock up with merchandise, buying products for the winter season.  In common with Flor De María, the other members of the group each have their own personal story.  However, what they all have in common is the effort and hard work that they put in every day for the good of their families.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Oscar Ivan

texts.es: Oscar tiene 24 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, el reside en la comunidad de patuca, Olancho. Oscar aprendió el negocio de su papa siendo que su familia se dedica a la siembra y cultivo de café, su papa le ha apoyado mucho para que el aprendiera del oficio y lograra implementar su propia finca, por lo que desde hace 8 años comenzó a sembrar su propia finca, el trabajo lo realiza a diario, el trabajo lo realiza solo y cuando es temporada de cosecha tiene empleados para recolectar el café ya que el trabajo es abundante y no lo podría hacer solo. Una de las ventajas que tiene es que vende a un buen precio el producto y la desventaja es porque la cosecha solo se da una vez al año y aun así el negocio resulta rentable. El préstamo que Oscar solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo. Con la ayuda de este préstamo el podrá mejorar su finca y de este modo su cosecha será mayor y estará en mejores condiciones. El sueño de Oscar es que su negocio crezca y poder convertirse en uno de los productores más grandes de la zona. Este es su primer financiamiento en FAMA y espera cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente
texts.en:
Oscar is 24 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  He lives in Patuca community, in Olancho.  Oscar learned this business from his dad as his family grow coffee.  His dad has supported him a lot in teaching him the business and helping him to set up his own plantation.  Oscar started growing crops on his own plantation eight years ago.  He carries out his work every day.  He works alone and, at harvest time, he employs people to gather in the coffee as there is a lot of work and he can't do it all on his own.  One of the advantages he has is that he is able to sell his produce for a good price.  The disadvantage he has is that he is only able to harvest his crops once a year.  However, even so, the business is profitable.  

Oscar needs this loan to invest in buying fertilizers for his crops.  With the help of this loan, he will be able to improve his plantation.  This means that he will enjoy a more bountiful harvest and be in a better position.  Oscar's dream is to grow his business and become one of the biggest producers in the area.  This is his first loan from FAMA and he hopes to make his repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Leocadio Freddy

texts.es: Don Leocadio , un humilde agricultor originario de la comunidad Palo de Lapa en las afueras de León, nos cuenta que su primer préstamo obtenido gracias al apoyo de Kiva fue un cambio muy positivo pues atravez de el logro mejorar la calidad de sus cosechas , le ayuda a darle una mejor atención a sus cultivos.  Ahora está requiriendo el apoyo para este préstamo el cual usara para comprar insumos y pago de mano de obra para siembra de maíz y yuca dos de los cultivos que más le están solicitando sus clientes. El dice que una vez finalizada su primera etapa de siembra le gustaría invertir en comprar ganada y criar cerdos. Pero siempre manteniendo su expectativa de ampliar más sus siembras.
texts.en: Leocadio is a humble farmer from Palo de Lapa community, on the outskirts of León.  He tells us that the first loan he received with Kiva's support brought about a very positive change because he was able to improve the quality of his harvests.  It helped him to better care for his crops.  He needs the support of this new loan to buy farming supplies and to pay laborers to sow corn and cassava, two of the crops that are in most demand with his customers.  He says that once he has finished the first stage of his sowing, he would like to invest in buying livestock and raising pigs.  However, he still hopes to expand his sowing as well.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay laborers to sow corn and cassava

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is 31 years old and a married woman. She lives in Sahab, Jordan. She is a mother of 2 children. 

Asmaa is looking to have a loan of 400 JDs so she can increase her income by retailing cosmetics and perfumes from her home.

loans.use: to retail cosmetics and perfumes

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is 33 years old and a married woman. She is a mother of 3 children. Naida is living in Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan.

Nadia want to have a loan of 500 JDs so she can expand her work in blankets and clothes sales. She hopes to open her own shop in the future.

loans.use: to sell blankets and clothes

loans.name: Ziad

texts.en:
Ziad is 45 years old and a married man. A father of 2 children, he lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan.

Ziad is looking to have a loan of 1200 JDs, thus he can expand his work in foodstuffs retail which will make him able to open his own grocery in the future.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs and distribute them

loans.name: Mzia

texts.en:
Mzia is 47 years old, married, and has one son. She lives in Dmanisi District, East Georgia. The family earns a living through the agricultural business. They have a dairy farm with three milk cows. 

Mzia and her husband produce traditional Georgian cheese and sell it to local dairy products retailers. As the demand for their cheese is quite high and the milk gathered from their three milk cows is not enough to satisfy the demand, Mzia purchases milk from neighborhood farmers and uses it for cheese production. The total average monthly income of the family is 1,500 Laris.

Mzia is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase two additional milk cows. She will produce all her cheese from her own milk, which will save their costs on purchasing milk. The cost of production will decrease and the profit for the family will increase. They will use the profits for purchasing needed household goods to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase two milk cows

loans.name: Kinyantale Tweimukye Group

texts.en:
John is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy fertilizers for his farm. He has been farming for 10 years.  Price fluctuations and inflation affect his business 

John is a member of a group where each one guarantees the other in accessing the loan. He dreams of educating his children and buying land to grow more crops as his business is very lucrative.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a conservative woman and she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet, so the photo is of her mother.

Abeer is 33 years old and a married woman; she lives in Nao'or, Jordan. 

Abeer is looking to have a loan of 1200 JDs so she can expand her work in retailing cosmetics and perfumes. She wants to make a special place in her home for this business.

loans.use: to retail cosmetics and perfumes

loans.name: Nihad

texts.en:
Nihad is 34 years old and a single man.He lives in Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan.

Nihad is looking to have a loan of 400 JDs so he can expand his project in milk sales by buying more raw materials.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for milk sales

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is 37 years old and a married woman. A mother of 4 children, she lives in Madaba, Jordan.

Manal is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Manal is looking to have a loan of 300 JDs so she can improve her home living conditions and fix her house up.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son.

Wafaa is 46 years and a old married woman, a mother of 3 children. She lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan.

Wafaa is looking to have a loan of 400 JDs so she can expand her work selling clothes and cosmetics.

loans.use: to retail clothes and cosmetics

loans.name: Sultan

texts.en:
Sultan is 30 years old. He is married and lives in Sana'a, Yemen. He has three children. He is determined to overcome challenges to help his family to get ahead. 

With help from his family, Sultan was able to study in university for a year, but because his parents didn't have the necessary resources, he was unable to complete his studying. 

Currently, he is operating a clothing store. He knows how to deal well with his customers, so he always tries to purchase clothes so that his customers will feel happy and will be able to recommend him to others. 

He is doing all he can to provide his family with a good quality of life. He applied for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB to buy shirts, pants, dresses, blouses, etc., so that he can increase his profit. He hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell in his business.

loans.name: Talal

texts.en:
Talal is 33 years old, a single man who lives in Sana'a, Yemen. His educational background is Bachelor's degree. He is cheerful and a hardworking man. He worked in a welding workshop, then he expanded his business and opened a workshop for building prepared houses. 

Every day, he gets up with his characteristic optimism and cheerfulness in order to work at his business. Due to the shortage of financial resources, he requested a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy iron to make prepared houses. With this loan he will be able to offer a greater variety of houses and rents for his customers. This way he will continue struggling every day to become a famous for his work.

loans.use: to buy iron to make prepared houses for his customers.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 42-year-old married woman who lives in Al Salt, Al Balqa, Jordan.

Sahar is looking to have a loan of 800 JODs to improve and fix her home and change some decorations to be more beautiful and healthful.

loans.use: to improve her house.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa is a conservative woman, so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Sanaa is 43 years old and a married woman. A mother of 6 children, she lives in Madaba, Jordan.

Sanaa is looking to have a loan of 800 JDs so she can increase her income by buying and selling clothes.

loans.use: to sell clothes

loans.name: Ansaf Group

texts.en:
This group is called Ansaf and consists of 4 members: Ansaf, Khwzran, Abeer and Angham. This group lives in Taiz, Yemen. They are a very cheerful and hardworking. They took a loan of 160,000 YER. 

Ansaf is the leader of the group (she is the woman who is seated in the photo) where she lives in Taiz. She is 42 years old. Her educational background is primary school. She has 6 children and loves them with all of her heart and that is why she has always worked a lot. Her business is sewing which she has been working at for 5 years. She started her business with sewing robes in her house then she purchased a sewing machine to sew various ladies' fabrics. She does this in order to give her family the best and so that they will be happy. She asked for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy a sewing machine, ladies' fabrics, and needles, etc. She hopes to open a sewing store in her area and works a lot.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, ladies' fabrics and needles, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Abdulwly

texts.en:
Abdulwly is 38 years old, married and has four children. His educational background is a bachelor's degree. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. 

He faced several challenges. Among these are natural disasters such as heavy rain, which caused him need constant repairs to his house. 

He requested a loan of 100,000 YER to buy cement and sand to protect the house from heavy rains. He hopes to improve his living conditions and raise  his children so that he can enroll them in private schools.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to protect his house from heavy rains.

loans.name: Bahyah

texts.en:
Bahyah is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son.

Bahyah is 43 years old and a married woman. A mother of 4 children, she lives in Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan.

Bahyah is looking to have a loan of 500 JDs so she can expand her project in milk sales.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for milk sales

loans.name: Altgarh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Altrarh and it consists of four ladies: Saeeda, Sarah, Nadrh and Aisha, who have been operating different businesses. All of them are hardworking family women. They live in Aden, Yemen. They took a loan of 200,000 YER. 

Saeeda is the leader of group. (She is the second woman from left side who wears glasses.) She is 40 years old and the mother of eight children who live together in Aden, Yemen.  

She feels young and is enthusiastic to sell clothes and shoes to her lady customers. She collected a small capital from a women's association. She believes that business has been going so well because she is very friendly and is well known. 

Due to the bad situation in Yemen, her business is currently bringing less profit. She requested a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy additional goods such as ladies' clothes and also shoes. This will allow her to offer a greater variety to her customers and increase her income, helping her to continue working toward getting more profit and improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional goods such as ladies' clothes and also shoes for her business.

loans.name: Mahros

texts.en:
Mahros is 29 years old, a single man, and lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been operating a grocery store for 6 years. His business was only an idea when his elder brother encouraged him to open his grocery. He is ambitious to work not only in this field but also more so that his life will go well. He would like to get married and improve his living conditions. 

Mahros is planning to expand his business and stock it with additional products. He asked for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy grocery items like canned food, soft drinks, mineral water  and biscuits, etc. With this loan he believes his business will improve so that he can get married. He hopes to open a spice shop to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy grocery items like canned food, soft drinks, mineral water  and biscuits, etc. for his business

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the Internet, so the photo is of her mother.

Asmaa is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. Asmaa is living in Hay Nazal, Jordan.

Asmaa is looking to have a loan of 500 JODs so she can increase her income by buying more clothes to resell from her home.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell.

loans.name: Mayra Gianny

texts.es: Mayra tiene 21 años de edad, es casada y no tiene hijos, ella y su esposo residen en la comunidad de patuca, Olancho. Su esposo se dedica a trabajar en el campo, el es muy cumplido con sus obligaciones, Mayra se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar pero también trabaja en el campo con su esposo, son una familia luchadora y unida, se colaboran en el trabajo y eso hace  que se lleven muy bien como pareja, una de sus sueños es que algún día puedan tener hijos, poderles proveer en sus estudios y que no les haga falta nada tanto en lo económico, como en la salud y educación. Mayra inicio su negocio por la ayuda de su padre quien fue que le enseño a como cultivar la tierra, poco a poco con la ayuda de mozos fue cosechando su finca y luego que se caso con el apoyo de su esposo empezaron a cosechar y cuidar el café, en la actualidad ambos trabajan en la siembra de café lo hacen a tiempo completo, siendo que es una fuente de ingreso para su hogar. El préstamo que Mayra esta solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes para el mejoramiento de la finca. Uno de los problemas que se les presentan es en la temporada de invierno que debido a tanta lluvia el grano de café se cae y esto les ocasiona perdidas. Una de sus metas es seguir cultivando en mayor cantidad para que en un futuro poder emprender otro negocio que le genere ingresos además del café. Este es el primer financiamiento que obtiene en FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Mayra is 21 years old, married, and has no children. She and her husband live in the community of Patuca, Olancho. Her husband works in the fields and is very responsible with his obligations. Mayra works tending the home and also works in the field with her husband. They are a hard-working and united family. They work together and this makes them get along well as a couple.

One of their dreams is that someday they will be able to have children and provide them with a good education and not have them lack anything financially, or in health or education. Mayra began her business with her father's help. He taught her how to farm the land. Little by little, with the help of the laborers who harvested her land and then after marrying, with the help of her husband, began to grow and care for coffee beans. They are both currently working raising coffee beans and they work full-time. This work is their only source of income. Mayra is asking for a loan to be used to invest in fertilizers to improve the farmland. One challenge they face is that during winter there is too much rain and the coffee beans fall off and sometimes are lost. One of their goals is to keep growing more so that in the future they can start another business to generate income in addition to the coffee. This is the first loan she has gotten from FAMA and she expects to make the payments on time.

loans.use: buy fertilizers

loans.name: Abduljbar

texts.en:
Abduljbar is a 30-year-old married man who has three children who live together in Taiz, Yemen. 

He got some land from his father and then he built a house in the village. Due to the bad situation in Yemen, he doesn't have sufficient money to repair his house. So he needs to take out a loan of 100,000 YER to buy cement, etc. He hopes to have a car and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, etc., to repair his house.

loans.name: Rola

texts.en:
Rola is a 25-year-old single woman who lives in Sahab, Jordan.

Rola is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so she can buy more clothes to sell and increase her income.

Rola is under 30 years old so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Zaina

texts.en:
Zaina is a 37-year-old married woman, a mother of three children. She lives in Al Aqaba, Jordan.

Zaina is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD so she can expand her work in cosmetics and perfumes sales so her income will increase.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics and perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en:
Ahmed is a 48-year-old married man who lives in Taiz, Yemen. His educational background is primary school. He is doing the best he can to support himself and live as he should. 

First, he was a driver in a company for seven years. When he collected money, he got land from his father in order to build a small house. He strives to apply himself to his family needs. 

Today, he is asking to borrow a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy building materials like cement. He thinks with this loan he will improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building materials like blocks and cement.

loans.name: Virginia Rubidia

texts.es:
Virginia tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera. Ella se dedica desde hace seis años a confeccionar trajes vestidos, faldas, camisas para damas y caballeros, aprendió a costurar gracias a un curso de corte y confección que asistió en el año 1999 en el pueblo donde vive. Los productos que necesita los compra en una ciudad que se encuentra a una hora y media de su casa, aborda un solo autobús, ya que vive cerca de la avenida donde pasa el autobús.  

El préstamo será invertido en la compra de una maquina de coser domestica y algunos materiales como hilo, siperes, broches, botones, remaches, entre otros. De esta manera Virginia poseerá una maquina nueva que le permitirá trabajar más y de mejor manera para obtener mejores ingresos ya que la que tiene le falla bastante porque ya esta viejita. Con los ingresos que reciba comprara más materiales evitando de esta forma viajar más seguido a comprar los productos.
texts.en:
Virginia is 28 years old and single. She has been making suits, dress, skirts and shirts for ladies and gentlemen for six years. She learned to sew through a tailoring course she attended in 1999 in the town where she lives. She buys the materials she needs in a city an hour and a half from her house. She takes a single bus and lives near the street where the bus stops.

The loan will be used to purchase a domestic sewing machine and material such as thread, zippers, clasps, buttons and rivets among other items.  Thus Virginia will have a new machine that will allow her to work harder and better and earn more income since the machine she has fails a lot because it is quite old. With the income she receives she will buy more materials so that she does not have to travel so often to buy the items she needs.

loans.use: to buy a domestic sewing machine and some materials such as thread, zippers, clasps, buttons and rivets among other items.

loans.name: Aliya

texts.en:
Aliya is a 46-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She lives in Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Aliya is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD so she can increase her work in selling blankets to improve her social and economic level.

loans.use: to buy blankets to resell.

loans.name: Benkan Group

texts.fr:
Constitué exclusivement de 5 femmes mariées, les membres de groupe Benkan vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. 
Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, de balaies, chaussures, de beurre de karité et de pagnes wax. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégrés  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 5ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Fanta ( première femme debout  à droite sur la photo) est la vendeuse de balaies du groupe. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 6 emballages de balaies. 
Elle s’approvisionne auprès des paysans confectionneurs et effectue ses  ventes en détail, au comptant, à domicile et au marché, à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. 
Madame Fanta compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 23.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et aider son mari dans  certaines dépenses familiales.
texts.en:
Made up of five married women, the members of the group Benkan mostly live in traditional families with an average age of 37 years and three children. They all live in the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali) and met through family relationships, neighbors, and marriage.
The members of the group do small business in brooms, shoes, shea butter, and pagnes (colorful wax cloth). 
With the goal of increasing their working capital, the members of the group joined Soro Yiriwaso and are in their fifth group loan cycle. Madame Fanta (first woman standing at the right of the photo) is the broom seller in the group. She counts on using the loan to buy six packages of brooms. 
She stocks up from peasant manufacturers and sells retail, for cash, at home and at the market, to a clientele mostly made up of women.
With this loan, Madame Fanta counts on making a monthly profit of 23,000 francs CFA, which will be used for reinvestment in her business and helping her husband with certain family expenses.

loans.use: to buy brooms.

loans.name: Camino Al Exito Group

texts.es:
“CAMINO AL ÉXITO” es un grupo formado por 6 integrantes, una de ellas es Virginia que es la presidenta del grupo. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora  durante 21 años se ha dedicado al comercio, primero empezó vendiendo verduras pero debido a lo sacrificado que era opto por dejarlo  y cambiar al rubro de abarrotes, en su negocio ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de menestras, fideos y diversos productos de pan llevar. Con el fruto de su trabajo logro comprarse el puesto de venta que antes alquilaba hoy en día es propietaria del mismo, y otro más donde trabaja su hija, su trabajo le ha permitido muchas cosas; lo que considera más importante es haberle brindado a sus 03 hijos una buena educación y la mejora de su vivienda, mas adelante quiere trasladar su negocio a su casa  y convertirlo en una tienda de abarrotes al por mayor, con su préstamo comprara diferentes productos como arroz azúcar y fideos, de ese modo ofrece variedad para tener contenta a su clientela.
